content: ['We were on site so decided to visit. We shared a few starters and a main with a couple of cold beers. For close to £ 300 pounds you would expect much, much better and I won’t bother again. Enjoy....']

content: ["My brother and I went to Bokan for dinner last week and I'll surely return.", 'First, the view, breath-taking! Maybe one of the best in London. ', 'Then the service, brilliant. Professional, precise, very knowledgeable and lovely staff.', 'And the food! Outstanding! The young Head chef, French and talented, is so creative. The association of flavors and textures, gorgeous. ', "It's been a long time I've had such a surprising and delightful dinner. ", 'Modernity weds UK sourced products with perfection. The menu is intelligent, using local and seasonal products, artistic, plates are wonderful, and nearly magical, making octopus dance gracefully with clementine and chocolate is definitely magic.', "Go there with no hesitation, you won't be desappointed!", 'Congratulations to this young and efficient team lead by the charming Florian.']

The setting and the view are sublime, the atmosphere is warm, the team is very professional, and the dishes will amaze you with their flavours. ', 'I highly recommend to spend a pleasant moment under all plans.']

answer_text: ['Thank you Elena T for your review. I have spoken with length with Florian who I know you spoke with on Saturday also. I would rally appreciate it if you could contact me directly on h9057-gm@accor.com to discuss these issues. I am so sorry and look forward to hearing from you. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['I dined here with friends on a Saturday night, restaurant was not crazy busy and we had a wonderful table by the window with an amazing view. This was the only positive point I can say about my dinner experience. It was not the first time for me here, I visited the bar and the restaurant few times and this was very disappointing: we went with the tasting menu and between the first 3 courses we waited a crazy amount of time (30/40 minutes) and we then asked if it was possible to speed up a little bit. After our request was taken very seriously and we did not even have the time to finish the following course that we have our plate cleared and the new course on the table.', 'The service was bland, not attentive at all. Clearing the table a waitress dropped a fork on my friend’s dress and did not even apologise! She looked at my friend like it was her fault. ', 'What is more I mentioned in the booking notes, I called and I sent an email as it was a special birthday celebration and I was reassured that they would have presented a celebration cake at the table. We had dessert, we had coffe, asked for the bill.... celebration plate never arrived.', 'This is not what you expect when you pay almost £500 for a dinner not even in a Michelin star or anything like that.', 'I won’t be back in the restaurant for sure.']
title: Disappointed

answer_text: ['We absolutely love your 5 star review Hallie14, thank you so much for sharing this. To be one of your best restaurant experiences you have had in London makes us really proud. We are really looking forward to welcoming you back soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Took my friend for her birthday it was one of the best restaurants experiences I have had in London. The staff was so so helpful and could not do enough to help you and spoke us over everything we ate and drank. ', 'We went for the 6 course tasting menu which was amazing choice and served so nicely and on request not when they wanted us to have it. It is a great relaxing restaurant.']
title: Great food, service and amazing views

answer_text: ['Thank you Richard A for your review and I am so sad to read your feedback. Please be assured that you are not just a number to us, we really do value you. I would really appreciate it Richard if you could contact me directly on h9057-gm@accor.com so I can personally look after you and your future bookings with us. I really hope that we can have another chance as we have looked after you so well for 2 years I would really appreciate the opportunity to fix this issue and personally make sure you have a great evening with the table you wish for. I look forward to hearing from you. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - Bokan General Manager']
content: ["For about 2 years I've dinned at Bokan approximately 4 times a month and maybe even more. I even chose Bokan for Christmas lunch. I think I could be considered a good, if not a very loyal client. I have never pulled rank, never asked for special treatment and never got stressed out over the placement of the table. I have now planned a dinner for 6 at Bokan next month. For this one time I asked if I could reserve a table of my choice for this very special group of people to experience the restaurant. I was told very plainly and clearly ..... NO, IT IS NOT OUR POLICY! I was even told by one staff member that if I came 2 hours in advance of the dinner at 6pm I could then take the table of my choice because the place would be empty !!!! Now, I have been dining in the best restaurants in the world for about 60 years in fact long before any of the Bokan staff could even spell the word restaurant. The fact that for one time I'm not able to book a table of my choice proves several facts. 1. There is no restaurant / customer loyalty. 2. The management of the restaurant really has no idea what world class dining is about! 3. The customers of Bokan are merely a number and the place clearly caters to the transient diner with whom they need not establish a rapport or a relationship with. Considering this attitude of Bokan I will take my custom as well as my friends elsewhere. We will dine on the special evening mentioned at C. London (Cipriani) where I can book the table I feel comfortable at, where the table linens are as exquisite as the food and the white uniformed staff is smiling, courteous, and care about me ...... the customer. Goodbye Bokan. Your mediocre service will not take you far. By the way, The Ivy In The Park is also a wonderful restaurant that cares about their clients."]
title: THE WORST CUSTOMER LOYALTY IN LONDON! MCDONALDS STYLE MANAGEMENT & ATTITUDE WITH BETTER FOOD.

answer_text: ["Thank you so much Eutalia L for sharing your amazing experience at Bokan, thank you so much! My team are thrilled with your feedback and we can't wait to welcome you back soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family"]
content: ['The best food cooked by amazing chefs# served by very friendly staff! Amazing view as well! Highly recommend the restaurant # ']
title: Amazing cuisine

answer_text: ['Oh Shelley4096 thank you so much for this fabulous 5 star review about your bottomless brunch, we are thrilled that you never had an empty glass and of course that you loved the amazing food. We are really looking forward to welcoming you back soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['What a great place we chose for our bottomless brunch, never once had an empty glass for two hours! Never rushed us off the table. Stayed all afternoon. The food was AMAZING. Staff were great and can’t wait to return. Oh and the views are incredible even in Storm Dennis!! ']
title: Bottomless brunch with a view

answer_text: ['Thank you Ted181 for your feedback. I absolutely agree that the service absolutely has to match the food. I am so sorry about your experience at Bokan. I would really appreciate it if you could contact me directly on h9057-gm@accor.com to discuss your issues further. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['Bokan 37 is an expensive restaurant. So I expected the service to be top class too. However, it was very disjointed. On arrival, as a party of 4, we were not offered a drink but given the wine menu. So we selected a bottle of champagne. The waitress took our order for the champagne and the starters and main courses. She sent over the sommelier who recommended and left on the table a claret for the main course. We then waited for a while until the starters arrived whereby we had to chase up the champagne. When it finally arrived the waiter tried to take away the claret glasses until we retrieved them as we also had our claret, long before the champagne. Fortunately we had chosen cold starters. Then during the main course one of the waitresses leant right across the table to pour the jus rather than going around. The service continued rather haphazardly all evening. Overall, the view is lovely, the food is tasty and beautifully presented but the kitchen is let down by a disorganised (but friendly) waiting staff.']
title: Lovely food let down by front of house

answer_text: ['On behalf of myself, Guillaume and Florian, THANK YOU for this wonderful review about your experience in Bokan and we have to agree that the octopus is absolutely one of our favourite dishes. We are so pleased that we made your night so special ad I am sure now you know about us we will be welcoming you back soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Never heard of this restaurant before but I heard it was good so I decided to give it a shot for a special evening with my girlfriend and I’m glad I did!', 'The restaurant is very cosy with a great view of the city. The staff is very welcoming and the floor manager, Florian has been very helpful.', 'I took the octopus as a starter and followed with the turbot. The dishes where delicious, with inventive and original combinations of ingredients. The chef, Guillaume, did an excellent job and I will surely be back! ', 'I will definitely be back and I’d like to thank the whole team for making our night so special !']
title: Wonderful experience !

content: ['First,this place has a stunning view from the 37 floor,moreover there is a bar on the 38th floor and a terrace on the 39th f.', 'We had a very warm welcome from coco the French host and our waiter (Portuguese guy with mustache) very knowledgeable of all the dishes and wines.', 'We booked for the Chef menu tasting of 6 courses, very tasty food and dessert!Love it!', 'We had a very romantic night.Thank you bokan!!!']

content: ['Nice view but the service needs a lot of work ', 'Initially the host did not ask if we would like to check our coats. I mentioned that every guest had their coats in the restaurant, which looked untidy with coats everywhere.', ".The table we sat was good , since we didn't have any reservation.", "We chose a bottle of an excellent wine, which we didn't enjoy enough because the waitress didn't have a clue how to open a wine bottle, and cork residues felt in. So we asked for another bottle straight away, as long as we knew how bad is for poisoning the cork. ", 'The food we ordered was nothing special and overpriced. Our fried potatoes, of course, took 40 minutes to arrive.', 'Great for its view and the easy access, but the service needs improvement (not worthy of the service charge you are required to pay).']

Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Went with my boyfriend for his birthday dinner and it was absolutely amazing. Service was high level, food was great and the view was stunning. Personnel helped us with our dietary requirements and gave us the table we asked for when we booked. Definitely recommended!']
title: Birthday Dinner

answer_text: ['Thank you for your feedback Yvonne G. I am slightly confused as to why you would ever be told we were serving Turkey and Pudding and custard as this has never been on the menu and I confirmed with my talent that the only menu we sent to people was the one we were serving. I am sorry that you did not like the dishes we presented to you and indeed the salmon is served raw as it was described tartare. I would appreciate it if you could contact me directly to discuss in more detail the issues you had on h9057-gm@accor.com. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['I booked Bokan Christmas dinner because we were staying in the hotel on 25/12/19 and at the time of booking, I spoke to a staff who told me that on Christmas Day the restaurant would serve turkey and Christmas pudding with custard. On Christmas Day I was shocked and upset at the restaurant when I spoke to a waiter and I was told that there was no turkey or Christmas pudding with custard.', 'The waitress gave us a table in the corner facing the window and no one could see our faces only our backs. We received bad customer care, a waiter took our orders he frequently went to other tables and check if other customers were ok and if their food is ok and we were ignored. I had to get out of my seat to go over to speak to a waiter to say that I was not happy with the starter. ', 'I received the crab starter but it was making me sick so I was given the salmon but it was raw and I was unable to eat this. ', 'We ordered the main dish cow’s cheek and chips but when this arrived we ate a small piece but it was slimy and was making us sick. We called the waiter and asked him if we could have another main dish and he said, “No because the chef cooked it for us and cannot give us another main dish.” My daughter and I only ate the chips for the main dish. ', 'The waitress recommended The Red Seal cocktail, this was served in a long stem champagne glass and not a cocktail glass and it was very sour. We told the waiter that we did not like it because it was very sour. He said he would ask the bar upstairs to make us a sweet cocktail. We were given another cocktail in a black African head glass. I asked the waiter if he could let me know what the ingredients are and if grapefruit juice was in the cocktail. He later returned and said grapefruit juice is not in the cocktail but he does not know the rest of the ingredients because they made it upstairs in the bar. ', 'The dessert Christmas log with ice cream was ok. ', 'The bill was presented in an old reading book “The Facemaker”. I asked the waiter I have never seen the bill presented in this way. He said it is new.', ' I rang the reception and spoke to Jerome about the problems we had in the restaurant and that our main meal Cow’s cheek was taken away but we were not offered another main meal and we were starving. My daughter is allergic to all nuts so when Jermore offered fish fingers and chips he later rang back to say that the fish fingers contain nuts. We told Jerome that we would have the Duck legs with chips. We received the Duck legs but it was cold and when we cut inside it was pink. We got the chips later. I was unable to sleep during the night because the duck was not digesting. On the morning of 26/12/19, we had severe vomiting and diarrhoea. ', 'Due to the problems we suffered our Christmas 2019 was ruined. ', 'I am never returning to this restaurant again.']
title: Christmas Disasters

answer_text: ['Thank you Claire, I am so sorry about this and please be assured that I am addressing it. If you could please contact me directly on h9057-gm@accor.com I would really appreciate it. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['My husband and I were staying at the Novotel for a couple of days and on our first night, decided to have dinner at Bokan. We were shown to a table and were sat for probably about 15 minutes before our order (drink and food) was taken. Around 40 minutes later, we still hadn’t received our drinks, never mind the food. This was despite a couple who came in after us getting both food and drinks long before us. The waiters kept walking past and looking at the table and could clearly see we didn’t have any drinks yet, but did nothing about it. It wasn’t until I got the attention of a female member of staff, who looked to be in charge possibly and mentioned it to her that something started to be done. It was however, an hour, before we even got our drinks and then eventually our food came out. We were charged a £7.25 service charge, which seemed excessive seeing as it took so long to get anything to eat or drink. When the food arrived, it was ok but nothing special and certainly not worth the wait. I wouldn’t recommend this place, we certainly weren’t made to feel very welcome and nothing was offered as an apology for the poor service. ']
title: Ok food, terrible service

answer_text: ['Thanks Gabriele N for sharing your feedback about your business lunch. I am so sorry to read about the issues with the Events Manager and please be assured that this is not the normal feedback we receive and of course I will address it. However I am delighted that you really enjoyed your lunch in Bokan and the staff were amazing. I do hope we can welcome you back soon. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['Came for business lunch. All the staff were amazing, but very poor communication between the events manager and waitress. The events manager told us that we are not able to change the pre-order, but at the end of the day, the waiter changed without any problems. Also, it took a lot of time to organize because the events manager was super slow and not really friendly.']
title: Beautiful restaurant and staff apart of the event manager

answer_text: ['Wow, that a beautiful review marie072758 and of course we are thrilled that it was magnificent as expected. content: ['This was my third time at Bokan and as expected it was magnificent! To the person who welcomes you yo the last spoon of desert everything is exceptional! Can’t wait to go again definitely one of my favourite place in London!']

answer_text: ['We absolutely love your "Perfect Brunch" review about your recent experience with us at the weekend. I really hope we can welcome you back in the future. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ["Thank you so much to the lovely staff at Bokan for hosting us for our brunch yesterday. You might have seen this restaurant featured on Celebrity Masterchef recently and it lived up to the exceptionally high standard of providing quality food and service. We had the bottomless prosecco brunch and not once did we need to ask to be topped up. We were given a table with a five star view of the city of London, really beautiful. For starters I had salmon with steamed hen eggs and it was absolutely delicious. My wife had a tuna starter which she loved. The next course was sirloin cooked to tender perfection on the Josper grill. Fabulous. The plum dessert didn't disappoint either. The service was excellent and we would highly recommend this restaurant for brunch on a sunny day. "]
title: Perfect brunch

answer_text: ['Wow, thank you for sharing your amazing experience in Bokan 37. We are thrilled to read how much you enjoyed your time and how well Katherine looked after you. We are really looking forward to welcoming you back soon MichelleD1331. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']

answer_text: ['wow, THANK you so much Jimbhai for taking the time to share your fabulous experience you had at Bokan. Nelson is absolutely thrilled with his personal mention and he is so passionate about his wines and can be daring at times which enhances the whole tasting menu experience. I am sure we will be welcoming you back soon and we are looking forward to it. Thank you so much again. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['We treated ourselves to a big Saturday night dinner at Bokan and it didn’t disappoint. We had the tasting menu which was a foodies delight with lots if high notes including a wild boar and fig main which stole the show. A word about the wine though. Nelson the sommelier is an absolute star. I honestly can’t recall a better matched wine list for a tasting menu. And by Saturday night London standards it was fairly priced. What else? There’s great live music, a lively bar and terrace for drinks beforehand and of course the amazing view. Go on, treat yourself!']
title: Excellent meal, great wine

content: ['Absolutely terrible and unfriendly Service at the Bokan. content: ['Food was Delicious, pigeon best I’ve had and ribeye cooked perfectly. We were sat 15 minutes after time allotted but was no issue as we had a drink in bar. We left the restaurant and enjoyed more drinks in the bar ']

answer_text: ['We just love your review, thank you so much for sharing this amazing review about your Bokan experience. We loved reading how much you loved the food and of course the great service. I am sure we will be welcoming you back soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['The meal we had was amazing. Could not choose off the menu as it all looked great, when we got our food we just wanted to at each others.']
title: Great views, Great food and great staff

answer_text: ["We really enjoyed reading your review about your experience in Bokan 37. I am sorry that the taste combination didn't work for you on this occasion. However of course we are thrilled that everything was cooked to perfection. Great that you would recommend us and I hope we can welcome you back in the future. Kind regards. Jacqui & The Bokan family"]
content: ["I chose king crab / pickles based starter (as did my wife), really enjoyed that. £14 each, not cheep. Mains, my wife had the organic lamb £32, me the Stone bass £29. Both cooked to perfection. However, I fed back to the waiting staff, the odd combination of white coco bean, as a fish-o-holic, always eager to try new combos, I simply didn;'t see the point, didn't work for me. No worries, fish was beautifully cooked so happy to leave the beans (apart from the 3 I tried).", "Our deserts were lovely too. It is expensive, great waiting staff and you can view the kitchen. As a treat, yep, I'd recommend it. "]
title: Great menu choice, lovely presentation cooked nearly to perfection

answer_text: ['Thank you Keith W for taking the time to share your experience with regards to Bokan. I am sorry that you were not able to access the roof terrace which had been reserved for a private event. I absolutely take on board your feedback that you should have been advised at reservation stage, please be assured that I will address this. I am so pleased to read your comments about Cristian and you enjoyed your meal. I agree the desserts are stunning :). I do hope we can welcome you back in the future. Kind regards. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['A week or so ago I booked a table at the restaurant on 37 and was hoping to have a drink on the roof terrace on 39 on this wonderful warm evening. Unfortunately for us the whole terrace had been booked for the evening so we had drinks on floor 38 instead. I had only found this out this morning when the receptionist called to confirm our reservation. This was mentioned on the website but I hadn’t thoroughly checked it. The guy on reception on 38 was very welcoming and perfect for front of house. The bar staff were very friendly and the guy that served our drinks at the table on 38 enjoyed conversation and a joke or two. As we were leaving to go to the restaurant I had half-jokingly asked him whether the tip we gave him included a quick sneak view of the party upstairs he became quite serious and said it was not possible. Maybe I read it wrongly but he seemed a little distant from that moment. At 7pm the restaurant had only 2-3 other tables booked and we were served quickly. Our waiter, Cristian, was a delight. Both the receptionist that called this morning and Cristian checked to see whether there were any allergies and also asked whether it was a special occasion. After choosing our mains and changing one meal there was a slight mix-up. This minor error with our meal choices would have been quickly corrected but we were happy to proceed as presented and the beef and duck choices were delicious as were the desserts. It was a slightly higher price than expected with a main, a side and a dessert each, with just one glass of wine at the table around £60 per head. To me the docklands area has a slightly distant ‘unreal’ feel to it and there was less interaction with other customers in this establishment than we usually find in The City and West End. This could well change depending on the night and could also be my own personal take on the vibe. I personally love the established feel about more historic areas in London.']
title: Couldn't get to the roof terrace...

answer_text: ['Thank you so much RandomJLondon for sharing your perfect Brunch experience in Bokan 37. We are so pleased that you enjoyed your time with us so much. I am sure we will be welcoming you back soon and we are looking forward to it. Many thanks again. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Based in the Canary Wharf Novotel this restaurant is the perfect place to have a relaxed brunch with delicious food and an awesome view. content: ['This bar has an amazing view, great cocktails and good bar snacks but the service was awful! We ordered snacks and a bottle of champagne to celebrate a special occasion. After about 40 minutes we asked about our order and several people can around making excuses about a problem with their “system”. We asked for the manager - he never came and finally our order arrived with the waitress telling us they could comp our cheese plate ..... still no one ever came back to check on us or ask if we had everything! Just terrible service and poor management.']
title: Great cocktails - terrible service

answer_text: ['We all absolutely love your review and of course the 5 star rating about your night in Bokan. Antonella and Angelita are thrilled with their personal mention and will be rewarded and recognised for this. I am sure we will be welcoming you back soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Great service, amazing vibe, thanks to Antoneiia! And Angelita! - for making it a NIGHT ', 'Hope Tomas had the blasting birthday night ♥️']
title: Vaida

answer_text: ['Thank you Reni for letting us know about these issues you experienced. I am so sorry that we let you down and of course I really would like to investigate this further for you. If you could please contact me directly on h9057-gm@accor.com I would very much appreciate this. I look forward to hearing from you. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ["If I could give this place less than 1 star, I would. They completely ruined my New Year's celebration by miss-advertising their venue. ", 'We emailed them on Friday 28th December to simply enquire if they had more tickets available (No expectations as we know how busy this night is, and it was lastminute.com). Failing to respond within 24 hours (which is quite a reasonable expectation for such business) we decided to call instead. Upon speaking to one of their unqualified staff, they advised us that walk-ins will be available all night upon payment of £50 per person at the door. This does not secure any tables which was fine for us as we only wanted to enjoy a drink and watch the fireworks from up high. We were pretty happy with this result! ', 'To our surprise, today we receive a response to our email (4 days later - excellent customer service I must say) informing us that they are fully booked for the night, but hope to see us another time. How nice of them! ', "As we live in the area we took it upon ourselves to go there personally today and hoped that this will be somehow resolved as they have provided such bad service. Yet again, we were even more disappointed to see that 1st, the manager who responded to our email was so busy she could not take 5 minutes of her time to talk to us about this. 2nd, 'in their defence' (their words, not mine) the manager works office hours and was not there when we called on the weekend, so I guess misinforming clients should be totally acceptable, especially when it comes to one of the busiest nights of the year when all everyone wants is to celebrate somewhere special. ", 'I was shocked to see such bad level of management and customer service from such a nice establishment. I have been to Bokan many times before this, and have personally recommended it to many of my friends as probably the best rooftop bar in London, but I am sorry to say that I will not longer be doing that. To see a manager who would leave their staff to deal with a problem without facing it professionally, and allow others to take blame for their own poor service. Astonishing. Happy New Year Bokan!']
title: Not so Happy New Year!

answer_text: ['From everyone in Bokan and especially Antonella, thank you so much for sharing this amazing 5 star review, we are thrilled. I am so glad that you ended your holiday with us in Bokan and you enjoyed it so much. I hope next time in London you come back and visit us. Many thanks again. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Last night in London and this was the place we chose to do dinner and drinks. Antonella, our waitress was absolutely amazing :) wonderful customer service, great food and spectacular views! An amazing way to end a great holiday.']
title: What a gem!

answer_text: ['Thank you Twettiseek for your feedback, I am so sorry we have let you down. I would like the opportunity to investigate this further and would need some details from you with regards to when you visited us. If you could contact me directly on h9057-gm@accor.com I would really appreciate it. Many thanks and I look forward to hearing from you. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - Bokan General Manager']
content: ['We celebrated a 50th birthday with 6 people at Bokan. While the food was generally very good and well presented on the plate, the service was absolutely terrible. The staff was not trained and inattentive. When we asked for the cocktail list, it took forever to arrive, and the waiter could not explain the cocktails and had to get another member of the bar staff. The same happened with the wine menu. Likewise, the waiters were unable to explain certain items on the dinner menu, i.e. what they were or how they were prepared. Everything took an absolutely extraordinary amount of time to arrive. We had endless wait times between courses and long periods with empty drinks. It was very hard to track down the waiters for anything, and we had to physically get up twice to grab one to place an order. It was exhausting and distracting, bringing the mood down. ', "We were also not served at the same time, i.e. some of us were sitting in front of their rapidly cooling main course while others hadn't received theirs yet. The mashed potatoes that were meant to come with my steak arrived only after I was finished. The same happened to some of our party as well, where side dishes were forgotten or arrived too late. ", 'The food was good, but not outstanding. The "petit fours" that came after dessert, were not what we expected: they included cheap tasting jellied sugar candy and by no means "petit fours," as in “delicate pastry”. I would not recommend the “birthday cake” that we had pre-ordered. It was not a cake in any sense of the word, but a moussey fluffy mass on a hard crust. It was impossible to cut and portion and unpleasant to eat. We left it there despite having paid around £50 in advance. ', 'I’ve heard the same review from friends who, like us, also live in Canary Wharf around the corner from the restaurant. We could be regulars, but I’m worried to go back and have the same experience. This area is in dire need of some outstanding restaurants, and it would be good if Bokan cleaned up their act and invested in better service staff. The ambience and décor are great, very New York. We just need some New York style waiters. There, you’d get served a 3-course meal and are in and out in 1 hour...']
title: Great ambience, good food, terrible waiters, super long waiting time

content: ['We spent a girls weekend in London and booked this restaurant as it looked amazing from the photos but we were very disappointed!', "It was like a marathon, the minute we sat down everything was rushed and we didn't have time to relax or enjoy our food or drinks. We ordered cocktails to start our evening but those didn't arrive until after our starter so we had no drinks with our started. We felt all so sick after our food because everything was rushed and we had no time to diggest or even enjoy our food.", "The staff was rude to us as well. ", "When we confronted our waiter Florian and told him that everything is too fast and that we're having a bad time he just ignored us and told us yes the service needs to be fast and then he left as he didn't like the confrontation.", "If your table tells you that they're having a bas time then as a good waitor you should at least try and change things, but he didn't.", 'So we just decided not to take desert and just leave as it was just so horrible.', "Such a shame because it's such a beautiful place but I guess they didn't want us there ...", 'Carole']

content: ['It is an amazing venue, beautifully presented with gorgeous views of the city.', 'The food was of an excellent standard. What let it down was the awkward and inconsistent service.', 'The host was really lovely and helpful upon our arrival and even gave us a window seat which was great.', "However the service at the table felt rushed... we had literally just sat down and were approached for our drink orders immediately . We hadn't had a chance to look at the menus yet.", 'The waiter was pleasant enough, but came across as robotic and scripted in his interactions and throughout the meal kept asking how it was going. once is enough.', "Then they seemed in a rush to take our dishes away after each course when we hadn't quite finished.", "What was annoying at the end of the meal was the miscommunication from the waiter ,who told us they'd stopped serving drinks in the restaurant, however we could go down to the bar.", "SO we headed down waited to order at the bar and after waiting for about 5-10 minutes were asked if we were hotel guests (which we weren't) , we were then told that only hotel guests could be served at this time of the evening! content: ['So the title might be misleading slightly but it is my overall feeling. Let me explain that personally I judge a bar by its Long Island Ice Tea, especially one that charges a service charge even with drinks ordered at the bar...', 'First round OK, but my wife who asked for a double gin and tonic ended up having to get another bottle of tonic. Sure you will say that you get a lot of gin, but it ruined the experience initially. Long Island was OK,but not stellar. ', "Then onto the the 2nd. Well, if I had wanted to order Tequila I would have,but I didn't. To say the bar person took it badly is a bit of an understatement. Sure he may have thought he was OK about it, but sadly some of us can read body language, the rolls of the eyes and lip reading the commentary to his friends sat at the bar. There wasn't really much of an improvement on the second try but I was too tired to argue.", 'Overall poor rating based on the experience but the view is great']
title: Amazing view, cocktails meh

answer_text: ['We love our 5 star review and we are thrilled that you enjoyed your Bokan experience. The views are amazing and then the food that Aurelie and her team produce really is outstanding. We are looking forward to welcoming you back. Thanks so much for sharing your feedback. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['I would highly recommend Bokan for an outstanding food and London views experience ! Really good service and reasonable prices !']
title: Very good food and ambience

answer_text: ['Wow, we absolutely love your review and are thrilled that you all enjoyed this birthday celebration with us at Bokan. The team were delighted to read their personal feedback about how well they looked after you all, even the small and fidgety children :), everyone is welcome at Bokan. I am sure we will be welcoming you al back soon and thank you for sharing your experience. See you soon. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ["We recently celebrated my mother in law's 70th birthday at the Bokan restaurant. We were a diverse group, including toddler, young children and two generations of adults, many of us with different dietary preferences. The restaurant staff were extremely friendly, accommodating and hospitable. They attended to all our needs and queries and ensured all of us had the mostly amazing experience. The food was freshly prepared and very delicious. The price is on the higher range but worth the quality of food, beautiful view from the table as well as from the roof top. Starting from the reservation process to the dining and billing, it was a very smooth experience and I would highly recommend this restaurant for celebrations of all kinds; including those involving small and fidgety children:-)"]
title: Mother in Law's 70th Birthday celebration- excellent experience

answer_text: ['We are delighted that you chose Bokan for your anniversary surprise. My Chef is thrilled with the feedback about her menu :). Next time maybe start with a glass of Prosecco and then try one of our fabulous wines with lunch or dinner. I am sure we will be welcoming you back again soon. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ["The staff were friendly and very attentive, the view amazing and the food in the chefs selection tremendous - Oh how I wish we hadn't had the prosecco which did nothing to compliment the great food. When we go again I will order a decent bottle of wine"]
title: anniversary surprise

answer_text: ['Thank you Katherine for taking the time to write a review about your Bokan experience. I am pleased to read that you did enjoy atmosphere and the view and of course the service. I am so sorry to hear about the issues with your cod and please be assured that I am addressing this but I can confirm that none of our fish is frozen, it does come in fresh every day. I am thrilled that your other half loved his lamb and you had a great dessert. I really hope we can welcome you both back in the future. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ["We booked into Bokan as we were staying in the hotel, and weren't due to arrive until late and didn't want the hassle of going back out again to eat. The atmosphere and view is great and the waiting staff are attentive, but the food was very much a 50/50 thing. The other half said his lamb was one of the best meals he'd ever had, my cod however had to be sent back as it was stone cold and raw in the middle (I suspect from the texture it was previously frozen). When the replacement (very quickly) came it was so very salty it was almost inedible, coupled with the over salted fries it made for a unpleasant meal which was marginally rescued by a fabulous desert ."]

answer_text: ["Thank you so much Philip, we are so thrilled with your review about your experience at Bokan. Matteo mixes the best cocktails and I don't think I have ever met such a passionate mixologist in all my time in this industry. Of course Florian always makes sure the Prosecco is free flowing :), so glad you enjoyed him looking after you. We cannot wait to welcome you back soon. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager"]
content: ['We wanted somewhere in London to Celebrate 3 60th birthdays this year with work colleagues.', "I picked Bokan from the previous reviews and I'm delighted I did, what a find!", 'From the pre lunch drinks ably mixed by Matteo to the amazing lunch with (very) free flowing Prosecco and the stunning views, even from the toilet! Our waiter Florian and the team looked after us very, very well. I could not find a fault with any of the excellent courses served and all six of us who dined agreed on an outstanding experience.', 'Thank you Bokan, we will be back!']
title: Outstanding

answer_text: ['Thanks so much Ibby H we are delighted to read how much you enjoyed your dinner at Bokan with work colleagues. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Great good, friendly staff and fantastic views over central London. Total price was reasonable based on what we ate and wine consumed. Would recommend as social or work dinner venue.']
title: beautiful restaurant!

answer_text: ['Great review Belinda and we are thrilled to read that Bokan is now a must every time you come to London. Constantin is of course thrilled with his personal mention. We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['We have made Bokan a must every time I visit London to see my favourite gal. We have had amazing service on both occasions with Constantin, and would recommend this wonderful experience to anyone! ']

answer_text: ['Thanks for your feedback, and I am so sorry that we have let you down. This is so unusual to hear this feedback and please be assured that I am addressing it. If you do have the time to give me some further feedback to work with I would appreciate it. My e-mail is h9057-gm@accor.com. Many thanks. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['This sky bar offers lovely views and a nice sheltered seating area outside.', 'However the bar has a a very small selection of cocktails. I visited on a Saturday night, and ordered one cocktail to be told they can’t make it. So I chose another cocktail and got told again, he can’t make it. I asked if he was serving cocktails, he said yes but not those two, they don’t have the alcohol for it!', 'How can a sky bar not have the alcohol to make cocktails, I do not understand. This is a busy Saturday night after all. I was not offered an alternative cocktail either. I would say poor bar service could be improved a lot! I wouldn’t recommend this sky bar if you wish to have cocktails as they only have a small menu and they probably won’t be able to make them either!']
title: Average sky bar

answer_text: ['Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and so thrilled to hear that it was already your second time and you have already planned your 3rd visit with us. Looking forward to seeing you again in December if not before. Many thanks. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['What a great find. This place has both a rooftop bar and restaurant with stunning views across London.', 'I was so impressed with my first visit that I went back the following weekend. There are a number of places to sit and take in the views, however the outside terrace is quite small and can get a bit smoky. answer_text: ['Thank you very much for your feedback. We are terribly sorry to hear that we were not able to provide you a memorable experience during your visit at our restaurant. Louisa & The BOKAN Family. ']
content: ['We went for a bottomless prosecco lunch with friends, with the only plus coming from the flowing prosecco. ', 'The Niçoise salad came with no tuna. When this was pointed out, a saucer of extremely poorly prepared tuna was slapped down on the table.', 'I ordered a smoked pork starter that was a disgrace. I can’t explain what it was. Green tasteless slop with a few saffron sized strands of pork.', 'Three of the party ordered steak but weren’t asked how we’d like it cooked. When it arrived it was dry and again, tasteless. ', 'The cheese board consisted of cheap cheese straight out of the fridge.', 'After requesting the service charge be removed from the bill the waitress said she didn’t care why we were dissatisfied.', 'One of the worst meals and service I’ve had at a supposedly ‘fine’ restaurant. ']
title: Absolute shocker of a restaurant

answer_text: ['On behalf of myself and the whole team at Bokan, thank you so much for sharing your recent experience at Bokan, we are just thrilled with your feedback. I am sure we will be welcoming you back soon and we are looking forward to it. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ["I v rarely, if ever use the word 'excellent', but we had a wonderful dining experience at Bokan.", "Brother's 40th birthday dinner - accomodated for 5 adults and 2 kids with a table that had a marvellous sunset view of the London skyline.", "It is important to mention the children diner policy - Bokan are v welcoming and accommodating with a catered kids' menu) because you would not believe how snobby some restaurants are, not allowing kids below 7 years of age to dine.", 'Staff were attentive, knowledgeable and professional. ', 'I will admit to having a small degree of apprehension with the menu after having been burned on a couple of previous dining experiences elsewhere.', 'However. I was v pleased with the quality of the food and preparation. We went a la carte and the food was delicious. content: ['I’ve been living in London for over three years, visited most of the “hip” bars in both West End and Shoreditch, and I can easily say that it is one of the best places in town. Bokan is amazing because of the incredible view of the city, delicious gourmet food and banging house music tunes. It is in the beautiful area of Canary Wharf so the crowd is pleasant and it is also not so busy - there is plenty of room across the three floors. Must go!! Thanks to the lovely host Ventsislava provided nothing but the best experience.']
title: One if the best restaurants and bar in London

answer_text: ['Happy Anniversary first of all Amanda F and thank you for choosing Bokan to celebrate it. Florin of course is thrilled with his mention and as always he will be rewarded for this. content: ['We booked a table at Bokan for our anniversary. It was our first time at the restaurant for both my husband and I. The staff were attentive, and even catered to my dietary needs during pregnancy. Course after course the flavours continued to impress! The food was divine and we cannot wait to return for another meal. Great value for such exceptional food and service. And a big thank you to Florian for making our evening that much more special!']

content: ['First of all the views of London are stunning and I wanted to pop by for a quick glass of wine on a Friday evening to show my friend the wonderful view.', 'After waiting, and waiting at the bar I finally got served after 20 minutes.', 'I ordered two glasses of wine (circa £7.50 each) and was told it was not available and would I like a similar Pinot Noir. content: ['We brought our guests for drinks on 2 occasions. The first time we were there, 2 people ordered a double gin tonic which we thought was watered down. The view of the city is nice, but alcoholic drinks seem pricey; I guess you pay for the view. There is already a 12.5% service charge, so tips should not be expected but their system indicates otherwise and servers still ask if you want to give a tip or not.']

answer_text: ['Thanks so much for the 5 star review, we are just thrilled. content: ["I read a few other reviews, and while some people think this is 'out of the way', I think it's great to find a nice place like this in other locations than just central London. Drinks are expensive, but that's expected with this kind of view. Service was great, and we had a lovely time. Will definitely be back!"]
title: Amazing view

answer_text: ['So pleased to read that you loved the ambience of Bokan, we really love it too. However I am sad to read about your cocktail experience, I am so sorry for this and I hope we can welcome you back in the future and I promise we will do better! Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Beautiful place Nice ambient, with singer and live band. ', 'They have a huge liquor display but unfortunately a bit disappointed about the cocktails timing arrived to table and quality check drinks. 3 negroni 3 different glass.and garnishes', 'Ambience 8/10', 'Food 5/10 ', 'Service 6/10', 'Drinks 4/10']
title: Mesmerising views..!

answer_text: ['Thanks Liam for taking the time to write a review about your experience with us, I am delighted to read that you loved our vibe. We are looking forward to welcoming you back soon. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ["I ate here with my wife and friends. Found the views breathtaking and the vibe lively in the bar, whilst relaxed in the restaurant - perfect. The food was ok and reasonably priced. It is a restaurant with amazing views, but next time I'll return just for drinks and the view. "]
title: Great food, great vibe, ok food

answer_text: ['Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and I am glad that you enjoyed your time with us. I too am sorry that we do have to close the terrace at a certain time and this is due to our Licence which I am trying to extend... so watch this space. I hope we can welcome you back though to enjoy your cigar and the views. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['Breathtaking views of London to enjoy a cigar and a drink at night. ', 'Unfortunately they close the terrace quite early which is difficult to understand since surely no neighbors around who would complain on the 39-40th floor. ', 'Would have loved to stay longer and enjoy more drinks during an amazing summer evening and under a sparkling firmament. ']
title: Great Views to enjoy a cigar and a drink

answer_text: ['Thank you Slagian for your review. We are thrilled to read how much you enjoyed food and it was beautiful and tasty. We are so sorry that a glass of wine was spilt over you and I know how upset my talent was as it was an accident which do happen. Of course I am sorry that we ruined your night and hope you will return in the future. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['Yesterday 06/08/2018 we booked a table of 3 under my name,George Capita.We arrived there,2 nice bulgarian girls were all smile and happy to show us the table.So far so good.', 'We decided to take the tasting menu with wine pairing because my friend had that before and he said is amazing and so it was.The food was beautifully cooked and tasty.', ' Until something shocking happened.The waitress spills a full glass of red wine on my Hugo Boss white jeans and my Dior shirt and ruined my night.', 'The head waiter ,Constantin came to say sorry and he was very nice and he decided to drop the service charge from the bill but still we had to pay a bill of more then £300.', 'We supposed to go to bar in the area after the restaurant but I had to take a uber 1 hr and 30 min back home in north so I can change .']
title: Gread food, amazing views with a terrible experience !

answer_text: ['We are all thrilled that we gave you such good and happy memories at Bokan and thank you for this amazing feedback. I love that you bring your friends to visit us when they are in town! I am sure we will help you make so many more memories in the future and we look forward to this. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['A really welcoming sky bar with fantastic 360 views across the whole of London - great service with very friendly staff! We always bring our various friends here when they visit from overseas, and they are always, without fail, stunned by the experience. Thank you Sky Bar at Bokan for giving us so many good and happy memories.']
title: A truly wonderful experience!

answer_text: ['WOW, we love our 5 star review.... and of course that we cooked your steak to perfection! The views are fabulous and when backed up by great food and attentive service what more could you ask for. I am sure we will welcome you back soon and we are looking forward to it. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['The food is sublime none of us could fault what we had and my steak was cooked to perfection. The service was excellent, we were a group of 5 and they ensured when requested that we had a window side table to enjoy the views. Very attentive when a food allergy risk was raised. Would recommend to anyone, menu may seem pricey but the food served is worth every penny']
title: Very, very good.

answer_text: ['We just love your review and of course delighted that you also rewarded us with 5 stars at Bokan. The Gin cocktails are a favourite with many of our guests so I am thrilled that you enjoyed them and of course the fabulous view. I am sure we will welcome you back soon and we look forward to it. Many thanks. Jacqui McMillan & The Bokan Family']
content: ["Very attentive employees which want to help in every way to offer a great service. We had a couple of Cocktails up at the Bokan-Terasse (40th floor) with it's incredible view over London"]
title: Top-Notch-View with perfect Gin-Cocktails

answer_text: ['Thank you so much LJW0983 for sharing your outstanding experience with us, I am so pleased that we looked after you so well. we were really excited about the Royal Wedding and wanted to share this with our guests. What a beautiful day we got for it too :). we are really looking forward to welcoming you back to Bokan. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan & The Bokan Family']
content: ['I have been meaning to write this review since our visit to Bokan. We actually visited on 19th May, which is our wedding anniversary as well as being the date of the Royal wedding. The place was absolutely buzzing with wonderful happy vibes due to the special occasion that many were there to watch on the large screens. We watched a bit and I have to say it was nothing short of spectacular to be able to watch the royal wedding with the London skyline as the back drop. They really had set things out nicely for those wanting to come along and partake in this celebration. We were made to feel extra special as it was our anniversary and every member of staff we encountered gave us their best wishes. We were seated and the views were, in my opinion, the best I have ever experienced in London. We were served by Guillaume and also the husband and wife team. They were effortlessly friendly and professional. Nothing was too much trouble. Honestly top notch staff! The food was delightful - we had the three course set menu, including the royal wedding cake. We even got a little bag of token chocolates to take with us, which was a lovely touch. The drinks flowed and we had an absolutely fantastic anniversary; and it was down to the incredible location and views, the food, the fabulous atmosphere and the amazing staff. Thank you! We will be back again for sure.']
title: Outstanding from start to finish! Thank you!

answer_text: ['Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your experience at Bokan, I am thrilled that overall you enjoyed your time with us. Why not next time, book a table in our amazing restaurant on Bokan 37 after drinks on the terrace, I promise you that you will fall in love with our 2 AA Rosette Restaurant. Look forward to seeing you again. Many thanks. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['The view over London was amazing especially as the sun was setting. The ambiance had a buzzy vibe and the staff were efficient. The menu wasn’t vast but what was available was adequate.', 'I would definitely go here again for drinks but not sure if i would for dinner ']
title: Dinner

answer_text: ['Thanks Lukas, we love the 5 star review. Sorry you thought we were understaffed and of course I will be addressing this. Ah the famous Bokan Burger, we will never be able to take this off the menu. Looking forward to seeing you again soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Nice food and excellent view. Prices are reasonable for a suchlike location. Service friendly but understaffed. I recommend the burger.']
title: Good food!

answer_text: ['Thank you MartiniGold for sharing your fabulous experience at Bokan. We love the fact you like our views but of course your feedback about the outstanding service from my team makes me so proud. I am sure we will be welcoming you back soon and we are looking forward to it. Many thanks, Jacqui McMillan & The Bokan Team']
content: ['Great location . Very nice views and the service from staff outstanding. Friendly and welcoming . ', 'We visited for drinks reasonable price for a hotel and super strong so not watered down drinks here ! Very nice and worth the money', "Will definitely be returning sometime soon but will make sure we reserve a table but we didn't have any trouble finding a table", 'Thanks for the great service.', ' ']
title: BAR AND VIEWS STOP OFF

answer_text: ['We are thrilled to read what a "Wonderful Experience" you had with us at Bokan. The views are simply stunning I agree and of course when it is then followed by an amazing meal and I am so glad you took the wine pairing, then really what more could you wish for. I hope and I am sure we can welcome you back again soon. Many thanks. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['This restaurant is at the top of the Novotel which is just a little away from the main area of Canary Wharf so it takes a bit of finding but is worth it. We started with drinks on the roof terrace on the 38th floor which is amazing, especially as it was a clear, sunny evening. The atmosphere is fun and lively and of course the view is breathtaking. We had the Tasting Menu with paired wines and enjoyed every mouthful with special mention for the Salmon with mint & pea velouté. Service was good with friendly young staff and, although it was busy, it was still possible to hold a conversation across the table. We were there quite a long time and enjoyed every minute. Highly recommended']
title: Wonderful Experience

answer_text: ['Thanks Mark P for sharing your breakfast experience with us! I am glad you enjoyed the fruit salad and of course the amazing views. Hope we can welcome you back for a drink next time as Sunset is truly spectacular. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Breakfast meeting at Bokan with some colleagues. Excellent views over London from such a high floor.', 'Breakfast was buffet style. Reasonable selection. I enjoyed the fruit salad.', 'Had Rooibos tea which was excellent.']
title: Hotel buffet breakfast

answer_text: ['Your review really has made me smile and I have to agree with you on London during the summer break! I am so glad you enjoyed our bottomless brunch it is getting really popular. My team of course will be thrilled with their feedback. I am sure we will be welcoming you back soon and we look forward to it. Many thanks. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['Firstly, it was cool up there and a great escape from the hot London summer we’re having! ', 'Next, the views are amazing. Given I live near Canary Wharf it is intriguing to get a bird’s eye view of the local area from 38 floors up. ', 'Brunch was the usual Londin ‘unlimited’ (but not really unlimited, since it’s only 2 hours) Prosecco thing! Food was great and enough and staff were super attentive and friendly. Best thing was it was quiet on the day we went... maybe because summer holidays had kicked in and everyone has left the city. Fine by me!!! Stay away, I say. London feels much more tolerable during summer breaks and on any of the bank holidays.']
title: Excellent Brunch

answer_text: ['Wow, thank you for this fabulous review and we love that we delivered to WOW factor! We agree that we have one of the best views in London and we are very proud of it. I am so glad that you ended a stressful day with us and I hope we can welcome you back in the future. Many thanks for sharing your Brilliant experience here. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Bokan looks like not very much from street level but the roof-top bar - 39 floors up - at night delivers the wow factor big time!! We arrived late when the bar was about to close (and were not as well dressed as other clients!!) but were still made welcome and ended a stressful day in very memorable surroundings. We have been to various roof-top bars but this one showing off London at night, rates very, very highly!']
title: Great Bar - Brilliant views

answer_text: ['Wow Ray, we just love your review and I think you should put us forward to be one of the best views in town :). Thank you for recommending us and we are so looking forward to welcoming you back soon. Thanks again Ray we really appreciate you sharing this experience with others. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan and the Bokan Family']
content: ["How is this restaurant not on the list of best views in town?! The food and service was terrific. A big plus was that it felt to be a popular haunt for locals which meant that it wasn't swamped with only tourists. I got there early and was seated immediately without a reservation. The staff were really professional and swift in their service. Definitely highly recommend. "]

answer_text: ['Thank you so much John, I really love your review. The view is great and of course we do love it but it would be nothing without the great food and service. We look forward to welcoming you for our 4th visit soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Our third visit did not disappoint, once again. The food is wonderfully presented and with generous portion sizes. The view is fantastic and the staff are always very friendly. We will be back!']

content: ['Great Location and superb views. Staff are great and excellent Cocktails and Drinks. worth getting near window']

We are looking forward to welcoming you back soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']

The wine selection with the tasting menu was just perfrect!', "Special Thanks to the Maitre d'Hôtel Jérôme who was a Perfect Partner. answer_text: ['Thank you so much for taking the time to review your experience with us. I am sorry that we let you down with the service, I will certainly address this. I am glad you enjoyed the food though and of course the views and I hope we can welcome you back. Kind regards. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['My family and I stayed at the hotel and went eating at the restaurant our last evening. ', 'Upstairs a party was going on (The restaurants is in more than one floor) so there’s was pretty noisy but that happens...', 'But the servers was really stressibg and ran around (no seriously ran). The kitchen is semi open and they garnished the food on both side of the kitchen counter. I DONT think this is very appealing it was almost like you sad in there busy kitchen,,,', 'Beside the party the restaurant was very noisy too', 'The decoration is kind of hip and hipster. Pretty cool maybe a bit dark if it hasn’t been for the window walls. I don’t say I didn’t like it. Don’t say I love it. It’s a matter of personal taste and I’m pretty neutral about the decorating. ', 'We waiting way to long on our food - I think they were sending plates kind of slowly out of the kitchen in general...', 'Most of the waiters did not talk very good English and had a heavy accent (maybe French?) ', 'But I must admit the food was really good! Got to staters cause no mains seems appealing to me. I will put the pictures up. ', '(The menu hasn’t changed in a long time)', 'I must also mention the view! It is stunning!!', 'You can see so much of London! Even London eye. It is turning the other way if the big skyscrapers so again it is an amazing view! (Just like the hotel rooms’)', 'I would maybe say it worth a visit for the food and the view!']
title: Delicious food but stressing atmosphere

answer_text: ["We think Bokan is beautiful and we're thrilled that you do as well nashbob127! Thankyou for coming to visit and enjoying our amazing restaurant and bar!", 'Warm regards,', 'The team at Bokan']
content: ['Beautiful venue in the earth of canary wharf. Definitely go there if you wanna enjoy a nice drink on the top of Canary wharf!']

Staff allowed us to sprinkle confetti on the table to decorate and attach 2 helium balloons to her chair. ", 'The food was beautifully presented and the taste was EXCELLENT.', 'We had a great evening, staff were welcoming and attentive, decor was nice, the panoramic view was simply beautiful from the 37th floor and the overall ambience was nothing short of perfect. My aunt was made a fuss off and would I go again? OF COURSE!!!']
