answer_text: ["Thankyou for your lovely review AdamBilgy. We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time in Bokan (especially our wine list) and look forward to welcoming you back again soon for another great experience!", 'Warm regards,', 'The team at Bokan']
content: ['Sky bar situated in the Novotel.', 'Brilliant view over London, especially the sunset. Lots of comfortable places to sit, with very welcoming staff. Reasonably priced wines, with a good varied selection. Would definitely return. ']
title: Great for drinks

answer_text: ['Thank you so much Samirs64 for sharing your experience. I know exactly what Duty Manager you are talking about and he makes us laugh al the time. So gad you found our little Gem and see you soon! Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['A wonderful gem near Canary Wharf in a Novotel. No really inside a Novotel. It is on a really high floor with fantastic panaromic views of London. Much more reasonable than the shard and great cocktails. We had a moijto and a rhubarb version. Pictures attached. Abt £12 each plus 12.5% service charge. The duty manager is crazy and funny. We asked could we sit on a reserved table by the window. He said let me check. Let’s call a friend like on who wants to be a millionaire. Then after a few funny comments gave us our table. We were served by a lovely Italian lady and service was great and almost endearing. If you visit Canary Wharf or just want to have a wonderful view and not pay shard prices then come here. ']
title: Friday evening cocktails

answer_text: ['Lincoln, honestly I think you brought a smile and a tear to most of us at our morning meeting today when I shared your review and the most amazing experience you had with us at Bokan. The best of it was that "Jerome" who was the gentleman that looked after you and made sure everything went well (despite your nerves) was in the meeting and we gave him a round of applause. I am so thrilled and proud when I read a review like this and THANK YOU for not only sharing this special moment with us at Bokan but also to share this experience with others on here. We are really looking forward to welcoming you back soon. Congratulations from all of us at Bokan - Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['Friday 29th June may just have been the most incredible day of my life and The Bokan played a very large part in making this happen, particularly the restaurant manager, who regrettably i did not catch the name of in all of the excitement.', "I had planned a day out for my now Fiance's birthday and to her knowledge it was simply a day to celebrate just that. I however had other plans, that would see me propose to her and catch her completely unaware. ", 'I called the restaurant earlier in the week to ask them if they could help me make this proposal special by giving me access for a brief period of time to the roof terrace. On my first call it did not sound too promising, but after calling a second time, i was told that our server on the day would allow me to view the platform for a short period of time and during this i would be able to pop the question, whilst looking over the simply incredible view of London that The Bokan has to offer. ', 'I was still slightly unsure how this would pan out but i had everything else ready, the ring had been purchased, the after-celebrations were in place - I just needed to keep the surprise under wraps and hope that our server on the day would pull through in helping me to co-ordinate things perfectly. ', 'On arrival we assumed with reading the brunch menu and immediately had our glasses filled with prosecco, to my very nervous delight. ', "Between enjoying perhaps the most delicious and exquisite 3 course meal i have ever had the pleasure of eating, i found a moment to speak to the manager (our server) in private and discussed my phone calls earlier in the week. He very quietly assured me that he had received my request and after our meal he would offer us both a 'tour' of the bar and the roof terrace, which was not scheduled to open until 5pm onwards. ", 'We finished our desserts and the moment arrived.. my palms started to clam. It was time for me to pull through on my part of the deal. The Manager (who had been welcoming and hilariously funny throughout, might i add) asked my fiance and i if we would like to take a tour, as it was our first time in The Bokan. ', "He proceeded to take us upstairs and we looked through the bar's windows to see the view of the o2, he then asked my Fiance if she would like to see the roof terrace. She was very excited, as was I. ", 'We got to the roof terrace and the restaurant Manager said to us that if we liked we could spend some time here to take in the views, take photos etc and then left us to enjoy the moment. ', 'My then Girlfriend looked at me with a very puzzled but ecstatic face and asked me why i thought he was being so incredibly nice to us in particular. It was time for me to explain the reason for this... ', 'I dropped to one knee and told her exactly what she meant to me and the rest is history: SHE SAID YES! :D', 'Moments later, after the screams of happiness and tears had ensued, the Manager had re-appeared with 2 glasses and an ice bucket of prosecco in the other. ', 'He congratulated us and assured us that we could take our time and enjoy the terrace for a while longer, as we took in the moment. The gods were seriously in my favour that day, as the weather was magnificent and i really cannot serve justice to the views on offer, with my limited vocabulary.', "I'd like to thank everyone at The Bokan for helping me to orchestrate this special moment in our lives so perfectly and for going above and beyond. ", 'I recommend this restaurant to anyone and all the better if you are looking to celebrate a special occasion. we will certainly be returning for the brunch in the future and i will be telling the story of how you helped me to nail my proposal plans. ', "Lastly, i want to apologise again that i was unable to catch the restaurant Manager's name as i of course had a lot on my mind that day, but he was just incredible throughout. We wanted to thank him personally but by the time we came to leaving, he was on his break and not in the building. ", 'I hope the next time that we visit i can see him again and thank him personally for his help that day. ', 'As far as fine dining in London goes, it will be very hard to top the experience that The Bokan provides.', 'Thanks again and kindest regards', 'Lincoln']
title: Maybe the most incredible dining experience of my life.

answer_text: ['Wow, Liam is so happy and proud to read this amazing review about him! Thank you so much Josh for sharing this and of course Liam will be rewarded for this fabulous mention. Love the fact you got a picture too! Peter has a great team and is a great Manager and I am delighted to see this shows in his team. I am sure we will be welcoming you back to Bokan again soon. Thanks again for sharing your experience. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan & The Bokan Family']
content: ["I stayed at the Canary Wharf hotel the week of July 1 on a visit from America and the entire experience was fantastic. Tim and his staff were great but the highlight was easily the Bokan. I spent a good chunk of time there each day during the week and the service was always amazing. Peter and his team were all super professional, but the Star of the show, and my personal favorite bartender (now friend!) was Liam. If you ever visit this bar, do yourself a favor and have Liam serve you. The guy is a beast at his craft and made some of the best drinks I've had in my life. Liam was a huge part of the trip's success so definitely request him if you stay there, he's hilarious! My friend and I loved him so much we even got a pic with him! (see attached)"]
title: BEST BAR EVER!

answer_text: ['Thanks Christopher for this fabulous 5 star review, we love it. I absolutely agree that dusk is the most beautiful time to spend with us and the sunset is stunning. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Many thanks. Jacqui & The Bokan Team']
content: ['Best to book for dusk when the sun is setting on a clear night. Ask for a table next to the window. Food is outstanding.']
title: Tremendous restaurant

answer_text: ["Oh we love Antonella too! Thanks Christian and I so happy to hear that you love the G&T's, we have 60 to try so you need to come back and see us soon. Jacqui & The Bokan family"]
content: ['Best thing about Bokan was the lovely Antonella super service ', 'Food and bar snacks great ', 'G&T are fantastic ']
title: Great location

answer_text: ['We just love your review Mark, thank you so much. We are thrilled that you enjoyed the tasting menu and of course the view is spectacular! Looking forward to welcoming you back soon. Jacqui &The Bokan Family']
content: ['Went with a friend for dinner and tried the tasting menu which was excellent. Friendly & helpful service with some great recommendations. Decent affordable wines to pair and the salmon was spectacular. Lovely way to relax looking at the views of London.']
title: Great views and food

answer_text: ['Katherine, what can we say "amazing" review, thank you so much!!!! To have feedback such as this and being able to share it with the Bokan family is fantastic and they are thrilled. We cannot wait to welcome you back. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['Amazing, Amazing, Amazing.... ', 'We had the tasting menu with the matching wine as it was a special occassion. The food was stunning, the service was fantastic and the sommelier actually had the patience to explain to 2 non wine connoisseurs without us feeling stupid as to why he had chosen the wines that we were served. We drank wines we would not normally have which opened our eyes to some different options. ', "We had a stunning table with a stunning view over the Thames. We asked to have a little more time between courses and we didn't feel rushed, so we could enjoy the food and wine plus be able to have some time to talk. We will be back. If I could give this restaurant 6 out of 5 I would!!"]
title: Our 2nd visit - another fantastic meal with amazing service

answer_text: ['With regards to your allegation about food poisoning I am very surprised you have not let us know directly about this issue, We have full traceabiity on all of our suppliers so we could have investigated this and of course if you had this proven by a doctor we would take it very seriously. If you would like to contact us directly, my e-mail is Jacqui.mcmillan@accor.com. I look forward to hearing from you. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['Would not touch with a 10 foot pole. Yes, the view is great (assuming you\'re there on a good day). But the service was painfully slow (took them 45 mins to get our food out after taking orders) and you could tell the staff would much rather be elsewhere. When the food arrived, it was... below average. Not even average. At least, that was the case for me (I had a fried salmon... it seemed like their twist on fish and chips but the flavours were not a good combo, shall we just say). Now if you asked my fiance, the response is more like "the food was horrible" because he got a terrible case of food poisoning that very evening, after the lunch we had there. We didn\'t have anything else unusual that day so that lunch at Bokan was the likeliest culprit. His food poisoning was so bad he had a fever and missed two whole days of work afterwards. Long story short: not worth the pain and never going back again.']
title: Really bad food poisoning

answer_text: ['WOW, you were here for the lightening storm. How amazing was that looking over London! You chose a great night. Glad you had a good time for the birthday drinks and look forward to welcoming you back. Kind regards. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['Very nice setting.', 'Went for birthday drinks and turned out having a really good time. ', 'Attended on the evening of the lighting storm so that just made the night even better.']
title: Great Views

answer_text: ['Thanks NezD I really appreciate your feedback about your time with us! The view is amazing and I am glad you enjoyed it. Hope to see you again soon. Many thanks. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ["Amazing views of London's Skyline. Worth the premium price on the drinks as you can see the city of London all lit up while you enjoy a drink. Of course make sure to pick a night without fog or rain."]
title: Pricey drinks but you get a great view of the London skyline.

answer_text: ['Thank you patercake for sharing your experience with us, we love it. We do a great Vegan tasting menu so let us know next time if you want to try a few dishes. See you soon. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ["Bokan is a laid-back with a warm wood/industrial interior - with views spanning up and down the Thames. There's a bar on one floor, and restaurant below. The menu is compact (I've been there 3 times in 3 months and the menu is the same). The chef favours undercooked fish, but will cook meat to your taste. The vegetarian options are tasty and include cheese, but I think a vegan may struggle to find something unless the restaurant is advised in advance. Definitely a place to go - if you don't eat, hang out in the bar."]
title: The views make this place

answer_text: ['Love your review Leo86L and from your review this is not the first time you have been with us and we are looking forward to seeing you again very soon. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['Always great cocktails and a wonderful staff ! The view over the city is simply breathtaking!!! I would definitely recommend more music variety !']
title: Great place

answer_text: ['WOW Primoz, this review is just fantastic and thank you for sharing with everyone on here! The views are amazing and when you match that with great food and service it is a match made in heaven. See you soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['I was invited for a business dinner to this awesome restaurant with a pub and and terrace with astonishing views over the City ', 'The dishes presentation - stunning, excellent', 'Service - more than professional, knowledgeable and pleasant staff ', 'Food - amazing taste and selection of dishes ', 'It was a great overall experience']
title: Delicious food with amazing views

answer_text: ['Thanks Nicola and I love the title of the review which is truly mesmerising! I am sorry about the delay in the cocktails! Hope we can welcome you back soon. Jacqui McMillan - General Manager']
content: ['A recommended place to be,have a cocktails and some food to. ', 'Nice ambient, with singer and live band. ', 'They have a huge liquor display,a bit disappointed about the cocktails timing arrived to table. ', 'Cocktails level. 6/10. ']
title: Mesmerising views..!

answer_text: ['We really appreciate you taking the time to review your experience with us at Bokan. I am so sorry about the issues with the ladies and please be assured we have briefed the security team on this to ensure they are aware and will certainly address it if it occurs again. The view is amazing though and I am so glad you enjoyed it. I hope to see you back soon. Jacqui & The Bokan Family']
content: ['We went with friends on a Saturday evening after a few other ‘premium bars’ in town and I have to that the entrance was nice, stylish and classy without being too pretentious then the view is amazing! You can right over London with its lights and skyline so well worth it. The bar itself is decent and well in line with others in town although the service can be slow and the cocktails are at best almost half the size of anywhere I’d been during the day yet the priciest I’ve seen in quite a while. But this is London and your basically paying for one of the best views....... a comment I will make to the detriment is that we were twice approached by ladies of a ‘working disposition’ this didn’t make the ladies in our group comfortable.', 'Nice but pricey is my shortened review.']
title: Pricey

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', "Thank you very much for sharing your feedback.We're so sorry to read that we did not fulfill your expectations. Our will is to share and contribute to our guest’s memories so we're obviously disappointed and terribly sorry to hear about your recent experience. What you are describing is certainly not the service we aim for nevertheless, we want to ensure you that each member of our team always strives to provide a high-quality service to every guest without favoritism. We would like to hear more details about your visit so that we can understand what was the exact situation. Feel free to email us at jeevan.thej@accor.com with your full name, date and time of your visit and we would be more than happy to continue this conversation. We do hope to welcome you back soon.", 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['Location and venue amazing - 5 stars - but really let down by poor bar service, particularly by one of the staff on this evening who appeared to discriminate against certain customers in favour of others. He was rude, inept and really tarnished what was a lovely night at a spectacular location. What a shame.']
title: Fantastic location; seriously let down by service

content: ['I visited several times, love the Sunday jazz afternoons on the rooftop. ', 'I only had drinks here but will definitely try the restaurant too.']
title: Love this place

content: ['Was on a bit of a hunt to find somewhere interesting to eat with the family while staying at the Hilton Canary Wharf. TripAdvisor came through for me. Would have never guessed that such an outstanding restaurant would be part of a Novotel. Restaurant is on the 37th floor, bar on the 38th floor and rooftop open air lounge on the 39th. All with great views back to central London. ', 'The food was amazing. We had the tasting menu and kids picked just an entree. 1 or 2 courses a bit heavy on the creamy sauces for my taste, but flavors all good nonetheless. Service was super attentive.', 'Can highly recommend this for a romantic dinner as well as after work drinks on the roof with some colleagues.']
title: Wonderful food and splendid views

content: ['We visited Bokan as part of our stay at the Novotel.', 'The Bar offers stunning views of the city and is modern and has a good atmosphere.', 'We visited the bar for drinks on Saturday night and our main criticism would be that the security staff were very rude indeed.', 'We were told that we could not go up to the roof terrace as it was closed, despite the fact that other couples and individuals were going upstairs.', 'The last orders were around 2330. A polite and pleasant member of the bar staff approached us and asked if we wanted anything else, but then around half an hour later, the same rude bouncer approached us and abruptly said “Same goes for you guys, we close at 1am and we want you done and out”. Not even an ‘excuse me’. ', 'Unfortunately, this individual’s attitude ruined our experience. He was unnecessarily rude and abrupt.', 'Other than that it was a pleasant bar with good staff, but let down by poor security.']
title: Nice views but service could be better

content: ['I visited this bar whilst staying in the hotel below the bar itself is located on he rooftop of a hotel in the middle of docklands the views are amazing and the staff excellent,', 'although the bar is on the rooftop the temperature is ideal']
title: Excellent Bar

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you for taking the time to write this review. It is most concerning to read your comments in regards to your recent experience at BOKAN, especially when our team of passionate hospitality professionals is generally a highlight among many of our valued visitors. The service is our priority and we want our guests to have a great and memorable experience with us, therefore, we are terribly sorry to hear about your dissatisfaction. Every feedback is a gem and we would love to have more details about your recent experience. Please feel free to contact us directly at jeevan.thej@accor.com with your full name, date and time of your visit so that we can investigate further address the issue accordingly. We are looking forward to hear back from you soon.', 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['Visited as part of office group and service was appalling. Order was taken and laboriously handwritten onto a sheet of paper, then tsrnascripted into the order till. Bar staff are "supposed" to print off order and prepare and then waiting staff relay to table. Simples?! Except the wrong drinks were transposed, the bar staff didn\'t bother to print off order, waiting staff didn\'t bother to check that it had been started on even after a number of queries about delays and the non-alcoholic cocktails were served with alcohol. And that was after a 55 minute wait. Next round marginally better - except this time the insisted on alcohol free drink (Tequila Sunrise - without tequila) taook 45 minutes to arrive. Lovely venue but a classic case of style over substance. Beyond parody']
title: Appalling, inept service

content: ['My friends and I went to Bokan bar, ', 'really amazing place in Canary Wharf, the view is stunning and the bar has a wide choose of spirits and cocktails.', 'I would like to take the opportunity to thanks again Federico for the birthday cake surprise and to be so welcome to us.', 'We will definitely come back soon ', 'Highly recommended.']
title: Stunning bar, super atmosphere, great service

answer_text: ["We always love feedback Er V, especially from our regular guests and we're so sorry to hear that your most recent experience was not consistent with the service we want our guests to receive when they dine with us. Please know that I will share your feedback with our Bar and Restaurant Managers so that they are aware and can address this with the team. We hope that despite this you will return and experience Bokan as we would love to show you that we have addressed this.", 'Warm regards,', 'Sarah Martin', 'Guest Experience Manager']
content: ['I always visit Bokan because I am simply impressed with the views - they are stunning. We always walk-in and very kind reception ladies try to accommodate and find a table for you. 6 of us went to the restaurant a couple of weeks ago and had an amazing time - bill was £500 but we had great food, amazing wine. However, let me tell one very important thing - bar team and waitress are always rude (not restaurant\'s). I never complained to any of the managers but I cannot hide it anymore. The last time I went there - we were 3 ladies and ordered a bottle of wine. The waitress brought 2 glasses only but and I kindly asked to get 1 more glass (obviously). We waited for 15 minutes but there was no one and still didnt get the glass. I went to the bar, no one paid any attention. Then I found the same waitress and again KINDLY asked to get an empty glass because we are 3. She was so arrogant and started to show her embarrassment by saying: "I told you that I\'m bringing it." I cannot believe.. I said I cant wait any longer because it has been more than 15 minutes! Then she was putting an order to the till and just ignored me completely. I turned to the bar and waited for anyone to look at me and requested a glass by raising my voice: PLEASE Is anyone can pass me an empty glass? It was such an awkward situation.... After 25 minutes we finally had a possibility to enjoy our wine. Next time I tried to get a recommendation about Riesling wine which they used to have on the old drinks menu. The bartender didn\'t show any interest in even trying to find my taste. And there is always issues with the bar team and this particular floor - I don\'t understand why? General manager and restaurant manager need to look into this as I can see from the other reviews - it\'s happening very often. I think they are all demotivated or tired. To be honest with you, I will try to look for another good place in Canary Wharf on the top floor (didnt try any of other yet) because of this bar and team\'s attitude as I can\'t bother anymore - it always changes my mood.']
title: I've been so many times

answer_text: ["Thankyou for your review Luca D and your feedback regarding your experience in Bokan. It's a pleasure to hear that overall you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon for more negronis!", 'Warm regards,', 'The team at Bokan']
content: ['A fantastic location occupying the top 3 floors of the Novotel in Canary Wharf. ', 'The interiors are very cool, think of modern post-industrial New York lofts, you get that sense of style immediately as you enter the lifts that what appear to be made out of rusty metal box but are instead lined in a luxury thick wallpaper. ', 'The restaurant is on the 37th Floor. We are welcomed with a smile and escorted to our table. the views are great. The food is uncomplicated but sophisticated in its presentation. The grilled octopus is delicious and goes surprisingly well with the served ricotta.The rump is decent but not exceptional.', 'After dinner we move to the 38th floor bar for some drinks. Over the next 2hrs I drink 2 negroni and I was a bit disappointed that each time it came garnished differently.', 'The roof top terrace on the 39th floor has amazing views across the city but curiously you are not allowed to carry drinks from the bar.', 'All in all, a great place and one I am happy to go back to over and over again.']
title: Great views

answer_text: ['Dear Miriam,', 'We appreciate a lot your feedback. We always strive to make sure every Guest has a great time with us at Bokan therefore, we are happy to read your positive thoughts. We will inform Antonella about the kind words and we hope to welcome you back soon.', 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['Bokan is a great spot in London. The view is amazing, and even going to to toilet there is Instagrammable. We wanted to go there for experience, but it was thanks to Antonella that the night was unforgettable. Her service was really friendly and welcoming, and made Bokan seem much more approachable than we though it would be. Definitely looking forward to coming back, especially if she is working!']
title: Super friendly service

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you for the kind words. Your praises and comments on our friendliness are surely one of the best compliments you could ever make to us. We will share the love with the rest of the team and we are looking forward to welcome you again.', 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['I just came back from a nice evening at Bokan. You need to have a budget but you get the unusual view, a nice atmosphere, an interesting deco, a choice of surprising cocktails and the service; Antonella did add a bit of spice to our evening as she combined professionalism with a relaxing sense of humour, a cheerful side and an easy-going way. Happy to enjoy it again. Philippe.']
title: Worth your time !

answer_text: ['Dear Ayman,', 'We are glad to hear that our hospitality professionals provided you with caring and attentive service during your visit. All the BOKAN team is very proud to read your kind words.', 'When are you coming back, we are already missing you!', 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ["I've been in Bokan for a friend meeting and I need to say that the place was amazing. Not only for the view but also for the great waitress Antonella who served us. Professional and kind. The food is incredible and drinking with your friends with a London view can create a nice atmosphere. Recommended."]
title: Evening at Bokan

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', "Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We really wish to thank you for your kind comments about our fabulous team. It is always a priority for us to provide a smooth experience to all our guests from the moment they entered BOKAN. It makes us proud to read that you loved our meticulously crafted menu and astonishing views. We can't wait to welcome you back!", 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['Great rooftop in London. Good service and quality food enjoying really good views.', 'Highly recommended experience.']
title: Really good views, quite good service

answer_text: ['Dear Kimberly, ', 'We appreciate your feedback. We always strive to make sure every Guest has a great time with us at Bokan. Thank you once again for sharing your thoughts and we hope to welcome you back soon.', 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['On a clear day the view is fantastic! The breakfast was excellent and dinner was very good. The night we ate at the restaurant, it was very busy and the service was very slow. ']
title: Excellent Breakfast

answer_text: ['Dear Bonnie, ', 'We are over the moon to read your amazing feedback. It makes us proud to hear that you had a nice time with us at BOKAN. We are looking forward to welcome you again.', 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['Open until late, great wine , delicious food! We had burgers and some amazing bread with butter before, most delicious one ']
title: Nice food and fantastic view on 34th floor!

answer_text: ['Dear Jan,', 'We are over the moon with your amazing feedback. We are glad to here that you enjoyed our meticulously-crafted menu with the astonishing views that our roof-top offers. All the BOKAN team is very proud to read your kind words.', 'We hope to see you soon!', 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ["We were staying last weekend in Novotel Canary wharf, on Saturday night, we had table booked for two in Bokan, for my Mrs and I. The dining experience was an excellent one! The Head executive chef Aurelie, was serving and overlooking our table, everything was just spot on, also sous chef Robert was great and his team made their self's proud! Chef Istvan was serving perfectly cooked breakfast at morning buffet. Great service as well! Very friendly,positive, and attentive waiters and waitresses! Fantastic hotel and beautiful view, great staff! I can recommend this place for 100% to everyone! Thank you very much? Novotel Canary wharf, BOKAN."]
title: Great hotel, fancy restaurant!

answer_text: ['Dear Stefano,', "Thank you so much for your lovely feedback! We're glad to hear you had a great time with us and you enjoyed our service. All the BOKAN team is very proud to read your kind words. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.", 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['Was here during bank holiday weekend, it was perfect! From the food to cocktails selection, the staff were very friendly and welcoming! The bottomless brunch is a good choice to celebrate the weekend, the rooftop bar is great for private hire such as office / party! The view is amazing, especially when the sun shines in London! Definitely highly recommended and hope to come back soon! ']
title: Lovely rooftop bar with Canary Wharf view!

answer_text: ['Dear Suleman,', "Thank you very much for your feedback. We are terribly sorry to hear that we were not able to provide you a memorable experience during your visit at our restaurant. Please allow us to inform you that we are presenting a meticulously crafted menu of locally-sourced ingredients, inspired by our Michelin chef and our prices are reasonable if you take under consideration our unique location. Nevertheless, rest assured that we will take your comments under consideration for the improvement of our performance. We will have a closer look at the email you sent us and we do hope you'll visit us again soon in order to ensure a better experience.", 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['Me and my friend staying at Novotel, heard great reviews on bokan. When me and my friend got to the restaurant ordered our food and drinks. ', "We where enjoying the amazing views with the drinks we had ordered but where still waiting for the salmon fish and sweet potato fries and Mac and cheese. After 40min waiting for the food we got our mains, just couldn't believe £17 for two small pieces of salmon and small bucket of fries and my friend got his Mac and cheese which had more courgette than anything and was burnt on the sides, looked like a microwaved meal given to my friend. ", 'Really enjoyed the views but the food overpriced for small portions, i sent an email to complain but have not received any reply. ']
title: Great view. Overpriced food

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', "Wow a perfect score! We couldn't be happier from reading your awesome review. It was our great pleasure to make your birthday memorable and we're glad to hear that you enjoyed the atmosphere and service of our restaurant. Our team of passionate hospitality professionals strives to offer the best experience to all our Guests, here at BOKAN. We hope you'll visit us soon, till then!", 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['My wife found this little gem for our birthdays and it was brilliant. Unfortunately the weather was not good but otherwise the view would be fantastic. We were very well looked after by the staff and manager. The drinks and bar food was very very good. Definately recommend this place and we will visit again soon. Thank to all the staff for making this a memorable occasion.']
title: Birthday

answer_text: ['Dear Alexandre,', 'We are over the moon to hear your amazing review. It is quite an honor to be called your favorite place in London and we would like to thank you for the kind words. At BOKAN, it is always our foremost concern to provide a memorable experience to all our guests. Thank you once again for the lovely feedback and for recommending us to your friends.', 'Till next time!', 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['I have been living for quite a while in London and have been to several restaurant but Bokan is by far my favorite place. ', 'The view is simply amazing and I just can not get bored of it.', 'The staff is all the time really friendly and helpful. Guillaume is the one to ask when advises are needed, professional and knowledgeable on every aspects. ', 'Jerome is the one you want to talk to when wanting to laugh for a while. He always know what to say to make a big smile appear on everyone’s face. ', 'The cooking is Mediterranean style, with the French touch that makes the dishes delicious. Aurelie, the French Chef, is always ready to come and answer questions. She is really passionnate and you can feel it when eating her dishes.', 'I have recommended Bokan to a lot of my friends and I will come again everytime opportunities appear. ', 'Thanks Bokan, those 5 stars are what you deserve !']
title: My favorite place in London so far.

answer_text: ['Dear Christian,', "Thank you very much for sharing your feedback. At BOKAN, we strive to offer the best experience to all our Guests and are disappointed to hear about your visit. It is most concerning to read your comments in regards to your recent experience, especially when our team's passionate and engaged service is generally a highlight among many of our valued guests. We wish you the best of travels moving forward.", 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['I’ve been here many times since it first opened, previous visits have been fantastic, however last night was a bit below par, we had bar food which took quite a while to come out and was staggered, also the waiter was a tad aggressive with his response to incorrect orders insisting that he was right despite the 3 of us saying “no that’s not what we asked for” ', 'The customer should always be right, on this occasion we were', 'No need to follow up with emails just talk to your staff on the finer points of diplomacy ', 'Push the standard up don’t let it slip!']
title: Service slightly slipping downward

answer_text: ['Dear Kristina', 'We welcome your feedback as it is the best way to improve our service. It is most concerning to read your comments in regards to your recent experience, especially when our meticulously crafted food menu and attentive service are generally two highlights among many of our valued Guests. In addition to that, we are disappointed to hear that you found our restaurant prices high, but rest assured that our Michelin awarded chef is trying to provide the best selection of locally-sourced products for our Guests in reasonable prices. ', 'To sum up, please rest assured that we will take your comments under serious consideration and we will address the team accordingly. Should you wish to share more details, please send us an email at jeevan.thej@accor.com with your full name, date and time of your visit and we would be more than happy to continue this conversation. We wish you all the best.']
content: ['Came here on a Saturday around 8 for dinner with my boyfriend, and my review in a nutshell:', 'Views - 5/5', 'Service - 2.5/5', 'Food - 3/5', 'Without the views... this restaurant is mediocre and not worth the prices.', "We had to wait 20 minutes for the starters - crab and octopus... the crab had way too much going on and wasn't that great. The octopus was very bland and very disappointing. The steak however was fantastic - the only thing I would say is order one above how you normally like it. My boyfriend asked for rare and got it blue, I asked for medium rare and it came rare ... even though it came different to how We asked, we still ate it as it was a fantastic steak.", "The service is appalling! A few of the staff members weren't the friendliest, and seemed to try and get you out as quick as possible. One of the waitresses kept coming over to our table asking if we were finished - she could clearly see we were still eating and done that for both the starter and main. ", "If you did want to visit here, I'd recommend visiting for drinks at the bar to admire the views. I wouldn't recommend the restaurant. It is highly overpriced and the food isn't fantastic."]
title: Mediocre...

answer_text: ['Dear Jonathan,', "Wow a perfect score, thank you so much! We're happy to hear that you enjoyed the astonishing views and atmosphere BOKAN has to offer. Thank you for recommending us to future Guests and we hope to welcome you back very soon.", 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['Amazing diner, Amazing view, the rooftop are really cool! Perfect for romantic diner or after work with mate ', 'highly recommended ! ', 'Thanks to the chef ', 'JP']

content: ['Love Bokan! ', 'We came here at 6pm, the girls at the reception were really nice (Bulgarian girls) they give us seats straight from the door ', 'One of my favourite bars in this area.', 'Great service as usual. The view.... sensational... ']

content: ['Me and my girlfriend visited this bar on a Friday afternoon- I would recommend booking a table so you ensure you sit by the window to get the best views. The drinks are in the higher price bracket but well worth it. The staff were brilliant, table service and fizz/wine top ups when you have a bottle. We ordered chips, olives and focaccia with hummus and they were lovely and decent sized portions. Our waiter knocked one of our glasses over and immediately requested a new full glass to the table. All round great experience, will definitely be returning! ']

It was a successful evening and cannot wait to go there again. Thank you.']

content: ['We went to Bokan on a Friday night to invite some friends over for dinner and impress them with the kitchen of Chef Aurelie Altemaire! Once again again we were amazed by the unique flavours and textures of her dishes. From the starter to the dessert it’s a journey of surprise and different tastes that will not disappoint you. It’s a place I would definitely recommend if you want to treat yourself or impress someone. The service and the location are an added value to this amazing culinary experience! ']
title: It’s not a dinner it’s an experience !!!!

answer_text: ['Dear Adam,', "Thank you so much for your amazing feedback! We're glad to hear you had a great time with us. All the BOKAN team is very proud to read your kind words. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.", 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ["Situated on the 37th floor of the Novotel near Canary Wharf we were expecting good quality hotel food rather than the beautifully presented and fantastic tasting fine dining experience we got. So often even at a great restaurant there will be the odd dud course but this one was perfect in every respect. By the standards of some of London's Michelin starred restaurants this is right up there and considerably better value too.", 'The service and wines were all up to the same standard to make up a great experience with only one little complaint to stop this being perfect. Our complaint (which might be an attraction to some) is that the restaurant is a floor below the bar at the Novotel which is really quite noisy. As such do not go here if you want to enjoy a superb meal in a quiet environment.', 'Finally, the view. Just stunning.']
title: Fantastic even before you consider the view

content: ['Our order could not have been less complicated. 3 coffees with soya milk (bcause of allergy)... At first, it turned out that they just simply forgot to prepare. Till next time!', 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['I visited Bokan for dinner one night while staying at the Novotel (different review). ', 'The menu was very modern European and a little different than I was used to as an American traveler that prefers traditional American food - I know, I need to expand my horizons. ', 'I wound up having a sirloin and mashed potatoes and they were both very good. The best thing about this experience were the servers - two people worked as a team (guy and a girl) and were fun, happy, enjoyed their job and really made our experience a memorable one. Just super friendly, attentive and professional staff. Couldn’t ask for more.', 'This restaurant is on the 37/38 floor of the Novotel. The views of greater London are fantastic. It’s worth stopping by just to see the view.']
title: Great Food / Atmosphere

answer_text: ['Dear Shirley,', "YAY, Big thank you for your awesome review. It was our great pleasure to welcome you and we're glad to hear that you had a great time with us. At BOKAN our passionate hospitality professionals always strive to offer the best experience to all our Guests. We are really flattered to hear that you enjoyed our amazing cocktails, meticulously crafted menu and relaxing atmosphere. Thank you once again for your kinds words and we can't wait to welcome you back.", 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['I have been here twice now - first in July 2017 and then again in Dec17 and I know I will keep coming back again. Whether it’s in summer when you can watch the sun set over the London scene or whether in winter when the sparkling lights of London and the meandering Thames becomes your backdrop to an amazing evening, Bokan never fails to impress.', 'Surprisingly, the cocktails are reasonably priced and each and every seat in the restaurant has a amazing view - hell even the bathroom sink’s view doesn’t disappoint.', 'The food is great - if I had to pick a few, I would say the beef carpaccio, the rack of lamb and the summer berries cheese cake are a must.', 'Above all, what this place offers is a beautiful setting to have a romantic evening or a place to wind down after a long week.']
title: Amazing views and excellent food

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', "YAY, Big thank you for your awesome review. We are looking forward to welcome you for dinner and thank you for recommending us to other travelers.", 'Jeevan & The Bōkan Family']
content: ["On my three visits to Bokan I've had a great experience. In terms of location the bar, restaurant and rooftop terraces all offer amazing views across the city overlooking many of the capital's landmarks. The environment is modern and comfortable and our host Veni ensured we found an ideal location from a choice of available spaces. The selection of beers and wines available is extensive and the team demonstrated their deep knowledge to make recommendations which exceeded our expectations. I haven't had the opportunity to dine at Bokan yet but look forward to this with the options on offer. If you want a highlight to your visit to London Docklands Bokan comes highly recommended."]
title: Great drinks with a view which deserves a toast

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', "Thank you for taking the time to write this review. It is truly amazing to read that our team of passionate hospitality professionals provided you with attentive, caring service throughout your stay. Our goal is to provide a great level of service and excellent quality of products to ensure a memorable experience for all our Guests. It was a great pleasure having you with us here at BOKAN to celebrate your best friend's birthday. Till next time!", 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['I came here with my best friend to celebrate a birthday. The menu was amazing and as a pescatarian there was still plenty of seafood and Veg options to chose from. At first glance the prices look a bit expensive ( I’m a student so don’t have a big budget) but when the food arrives you know why it’s priced. I’ve never eaten food with so much flavour before, it was totally worth the money. And the service was amazing, every member of staff made us feel so welcome. Not to mention my friend was given a birthday treat with a selection of mini desserts and a little pastry/ cake to go. ', 'Planing on returning later in the year']
title: Cannot fault

answer_text: ['Dear Jonas,', 'We appreciate your feedback a lot as we believe it is the best way to identify our flaws and improve our performance. It is most concerning to read your comments in regards to your recent experience with us, especially when our team of passionate and engaged professionals is generally a highlight among many of our valued Guests. We would like to apologize for any inconvenience and we would like to know more about your visit at BOKAN in order to better address the issue. ', 'Could you please send us an email at jeevan.thej@accor.com with your full name, date and time of your visit? We are looking forward to hear back from you soon.', 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ["Overall a poor experience, we were three mates looking for quick dinner before going out. Arrived at the restaurant on the 38th floor, there was no hostess to be seen for at least 5 minutes and no one had greeted us, so we decided to make our way to the restaurant which is a floor below, once we got there again there was no one to greet us. After wondering around the restaurant a waiter appeared we asked if we could have a table for three. His response was you need to go back upstairs to the hostess desk and they will allocate you a table. Once we got upstairs there was a lady which didn't seem too happy to see. Anyway she brought us to the table.", 'Once at the table we ordered some wine and main courses, friends ordered a fish I ordered steak medium rare. Drinks arrived fast and the waitress was very good, however once the main courses arrived steak was cooked well done. I immediately said it to the waitress however her response was you asked it like this however I will change it, it took some time for my plate to be taken back to the kitchen. While I was waiting for my steak to be redone my mates were enjoying their cod which they mentioned was very good, while they were eating a team of waiters began breaking down one of the communal tables, while this was happening one of the tables fell to the floor making a load noise and getting all of the restaurant to turn around. This was not an appropriate time to be breaking down tables while the restaurant was still half full. There was no presence of management at all.', "Once my food was ready I could see it on the counter, with severel people touching it with their fingers to see if it's cooked properly. (the only person touching it should be the chef).", 'Once the food arrived waitress was very sympathetic and apologised for the mistake. However no manager checked if it was okay.', "Once my food arrived my mates were already finished their meal and we're in a rush to go. Also the side of fries that was ordered with the original meal was not changed and was left on the table so once my replacement meal arrived they were already stone cold.", 'Anyway overall poor service, limited menu, however has a lot of potential with the right management.']
title: Overall poor

answer_text: ['Dear Rolandas,', 'Well your review is breathtaking and we are over the moon to read your amazing compliments! content: ['So, those who know me, known how much I LOVE Bokan at Novotel hotel! Coffee ☕, mid day lunches , mid day drinks, late night drinks , jazz evenings , friends reunions️, dates or just chilled afternoons are so far just a few reasons for why I keep ending up on that 38th floor with all them stunning views. ', "The best part of it all- it's becoming almost like visiting a family. Except you obviously have to pay at Bokan... haha! Team is genuinely what makes my every single time so much more exciting and so much better. Veni and Teodora are usually two faces meeting you the moment you step out of elevator and God is it a gorgeous duo! And then there's this young gentleman, who's name I still can't remember for some reason, sorry ( he's having his haircut in Canary Wharf ), but he's your guy if you want not only a good service, but also to explore some of the best cocktails! ", "In summary, I could probably be Bokan's ambassador by now, but I know how important and nice it is to hear about good experiences, not only negative ones. Trust there are not many of those though. Thank you guys "]

Everything was delicious and well executed. Service was great, fast and personalised.", 'They even gave us a small cake with a candle as a treat.', 'Would definitely go again, and you should too.']
title: Great dining experience

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', "We appreciate a lot your feedback as we believe it is the best way for us to improve our performance. At Bokan, everyday we aim to offer the best experience to all our Guests, therefore what you are describing is certainly not the level of service we aim for. It is most concerning to read your comments in regards to your food intolerance issues, especially when our team's passionate and engaged service is generally a highlight among many of our valued Guests. We are sorry to hear that you felt you were not receiving a high level of attention, however our team treats always in a discreet way any Guest who has specific dietary restrictions. Could you please send us an email at jeevan.thej@accor.com with your full name, date and time of your visit so we can look further into it?", 'In any case, we would like to inform you that your comments will be taken under serious consideration and we will address the team accordingly. We do hope to welcome you again.', 'Jeevan & The Bokan Family']
content: ['I was staying in the hotel so reception kindly booked me a table. I stated I had food intolerances upon booking and this was noted. I was greeted and shown to a table and although initially service was attentive I was not given guidance on allergens in the menu and I had to try ordering a few options until I got one I could have. I would have expected the waiter to be more clued up on allergens and to be more helpful. It’s not like it’s a cheap restaurant. When my steak came the meat was cooked medium rare as requested but it wasn’t a good piece of meat and was quite chewy. I’m from a farming family so I know good steak and that wasn’t the quality I’d expect at a restaurant of this calibre. Something had been excluded from the dish due to my gluten intolerance but that had not been pointed out when I ordered. So, great that it was omitted however this should have been mentioned at the time of ordering. The “Amuse Bouche” was just brought to me and I had to request the waiter check the ingredients before I had it - again disappointing. I actually felt like I was a pain to the servers because of my allergies and other tables seemed to get more attentive service as I was sat there with an empty glass for ages and being ignored. All in all, great views, nice wine list but below par steak and below par service - specifically around allergens. ']
title: Mixed Bag - not great if you have allergies

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', "YAY, Big thank you for your awesome review. It was our great pleasure to make you feel special during your visit. content: ['We stayed at the hotel and booked a table before,which I feel is a must as this bar is very very busy.', 'Upon arrival we had welcoming that was warm and relaxing. Shown to the table by the window which has amazing views over London.', 'The waitress was friendly and really really knew her cocktails.', 'I had the burger and was so so delicious and cooked exactly how I wanted it. My wife had the mac and cheese. Now I’m not into M and C but tasted this and really enjoyed the bit I had. Presentation was excellent and the meals where reasonable price for London.', 'We spent most of the night having cocktails and really didn’t want to leave the table as you feel relaxed here and just ended up enjoying ourselves that much.', 'The price was right for all the food and drinks.', 'Definitely will return and hopefully have another excellent meal and drinks. ', 'Just to say thank you to our waitress who made the night a special one on her knowledge and friendliness.']

content: ['Went here a couple of days ago and has the tasting menu. Whilst the drinks were great and the views fabulous the food was disappointing. In one dish, coffee overpowered an over cooked and underwhelming piece of veal. In another grey dish, truffle dominated a fake celeriac pasta tube. It was almost universally disliked by my party. Dessert was a drab affair; some off-the-shelf chocolate three ways. ', 'The was only one was for me, and that was towards the exit.']
title: Great view - shame about the food

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you so much for taking the time to write this review. We welcome and encourage feedback as only through that we are able to gauge how guests perceive our service and facilities. The service is our priority and we want all our visitors to have a great and memorable experience with us. Therefore, we are terribly sorry to hear that it was not the case for you last Saturday evening. Please allow us to inform you that the satisfaction of our Guests is our foremost concern and our team always strives to show its utmost consideration and empathy. Consequently, what you are describing is certainly not the level of service we aim for. It is true that sometimes our bar can get busy however, we can ensure you that our staff tries to provide attentive and caring service to all visitors without ignoring anyone. We would like to hear more about your experience in order to properly address these issues. Could you please send us an email at jeevan.thej@accor.com with your full name and time of your visit to further continue this conversation? ', 'We are looking forward to hear back from you soon.', 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['Good afternoon Jeevan, ', 'Saturday night .. 24 February . we are a couple, i am Romanian by origin, British national my boyfriend is Saudi Arabian, future husband , we had celebrated our engagement and love . Unfortunately we had a really bad experience from beginning at Bokan Bar . We came to the bar as we heard is a really good one .', '1) The location is too out of reach , it means that I have to take in consideration to locate the venue . The transport is not a problem . Anyway this was not the main one reason . ', '2) The main reason why I do this review is when we got to the mini reception Bokan bar upstairs, we needed to greet the staff not her to greet us . She finished with the ex client taking care of their coats, etc, then we asked for a table, she was in rush saying i wlll find one for you next to the window. She went to find something, we were following her as we didnt know what to do, wait at reception or what / she stops at one table and start chit chat with that clients or friends . She forgot about us or what? we dont meean to be rude, but finally we asked her, excuse me could we have a table please ? the second time. she got nervous and said oh sorry about it , let me find then she starts moving . Finally she gave us a table opposite the bar , no view. Then she ignores us again. ', 'Thats reception girl. ', "3) we ordered finally our drinks and we were happy we got the table.... till we got water x 3 times and the drinks didn't arrive. We asked for the drinks but we felt completely IGNORED We were waiting more than 25 Minutes there . ", '4 ) Finally we decided to leave the place... no drinks, no customer service, nothing. Most of luxury bars they serve nuts or small snack as beginning free or as from the menu and have been asked by waitress.', 'What is missing ? The Bokan Bar is a very highly recognized Bar in London. You guys are competing with the bars and hotels around you The Pearson Room , Cinnamon restaurant Hilton, Scoff and Banter in Edwardian, etc but I have never had this kind of experience nowhere in such as 4 stars bar and Hotel . I have stayed in Dubai in Novotel, in Bahrain, and other places but never had this experience in my life. We travel a lot and stay in 5 stars hotels. ', 'I would really want to come back but the customer service destroyed our evening. ', 'And not the last one , we needed to spent time to get a taxi to re arrange our night out in the same time, time , energy, not good night out , money the last ... we lost . ', 'I believe to get good customer service you need to have good waitress and waiters who works in team and for the same goal to achieve the highly customer service and make each customer happy in order a business to be run properly. if you want keep your clients and business of course . That is a priority. ', 'very dissapointing']
title: A couple of key points for reference

content: ['Four of us went to Bokan. Great views at night seeing London lit up. The service was great and the food very well presented and tasted superb. The views are beautiful. Bottle of wine, 4 beers, 2 tasting menus and 2 a la carte menus with starters, main and desserts £332 so not the cheapest place to eat out on a Saturday night. Not a child friendly place really as it’s quite grown up and adult. 12.5% added automatically. Our last course was forgotten about on the tasting menu so we had to ask. No big bother really. Sweetbreads were deep fried and tasty. I think these were the pancreas gland ones due to the shape and not the thymus gland ones from the throat.']

", 'We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.', 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ["Fabulous views, delicious food stylishly presented by professional and friendly staff. As you'd expect the price is reflective of this, especially the wine-list - excellent sommelier though."]
title: Dinner with a view

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you for taking the time to write this review. The service is our priority and we want our guests to have a great and memorable experience with us, therefore, we are terribly sorry to hear about your dissatisfaction. Every feedback is a gem and we would love to have more details about your experience. Please feel free to contact us directly so that we can address the issue accordingly. ', "We hope you'll visit us again.", 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['Is not the first time we are going to the bar at Novotel Canary Wharf. The location and views are amazing, but the service we always find is rude and very inefficient. ', 'They seem not happy with their job, always in rush and they have no time even for say hello when you are arriving to the place']
title: Great location, Poor service

answer_text: ['Dear Sophie,', "Thank you very much for sharing your feedback. We're terribly sorry to hear about your disappointing experience. Everyday we strive to offer the best experience to all our Guests, therefore what you are describing is not the level of service we aim for. Please allow us to clarify that our brunch commence at 12.30 and finishes at 14.30, in order to avoid any future misunderstandings. ", 'We are sorry to hear that you experienced difficulties in terms of communication; our team is consisted of people from all over the world which is very common in the hospitality industry. Therefore for some of our team members English may not be their native language but they are fluent English speakers and always willing to assist in any possible way. ', "Every feedback is a gem and we would love to hear more about the issues you've encountered so that we can address the team accordingly. Could you please send us an email at jeevan.thej@accor.com with your full name, date and time of your visit, so we can look further into this? ", "We apologize for any inconvenience and we're looking forward to hear back from you soon.", 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['The view is lovely, as is the food. You enter the building prime time on a Saturday afternoon and expect to see someone on the podium of the entrance but there isn\'t. So you have to work out for yourself how to use the lift and which floor you need to go to. We ended up in the bar, but the woman at reception couldn\'t understand a word we was saying. Despite us being locals. She thought we was wanting to book a table, despite us repeatedly saying "we are here for our 2pm booking". Then we was seated in the bar area at a table that was practically on the floor. I asked to be moved to a table where we wouldnt have to eat with our food on our laps. He then gave us a bar menu. We asked if we could have the brunch menu which we booked for. He said this was downstairs but the brunch was now over. I advised I had checked online and that I was sure the last SEATING for brunch was 2pm and it started at 12. However it get very confusing as he couldn\'t really understand what we was saying either. We were just about to leave when we checked to say are you sure we cannot have a table and he said that we could but we had to order as the kitchen takes the last orders for brunch at 2:30pm. Finally when we got around it all we had a table booked downstairs and we were able to enjoy the meal however, it was a lot of stress for us.']
title: Good Views but they need to work on the bookings

answer_text: ['Dear Jing,', "Our will is to share and contribute to our Guest’s memories so we're obviously disappointed and terribly sorry for any inconvenience caused to you.We can assure you that this is not a true reflection of the service we want to offer here at BOKAN. Unfortunately, our bar/restaurant can get busy sometimes, nevertheless we want to ensure you that our staff always strives to provide a high-quality service. We would love to hear more details about your visit so that we can better address the situation.If you wish, please send us an email at jeevan.thej@accor.com. ", 'We do hope to welcome you back soon.', 'Jeevan & The BOKAN Family']
content: ['We want to have some drinks and food around canary wharf area, apparently Bokan is the highest bar/restaurant within the area so we decided to check it out.', 'It takes 20 minutes for the staff to come to the table saying a "Hi" and take orders..', "The whole atmosphere with the service we felt no difference than going to weatherspoon or other pubs. The food was ok, takes ages to wait for our drinks. No waiter or waitress come to ask if we need another drink. Someone finally came to clear the table after the empty plates on the table for quite long time..We decided to leave and we have to walk to the bar to ask for the bill. And we paid the bill with the full service charge while we didn't felt it was worth it.", 'Anyway, will not recommend it to any of our clients or friends.']
title: Poor and slow service

content: ['On a recommendation, we made a reservation for dinner on the 38th floor!!! Great ambience and views. Not exceptionally busy, but service was slow and laborious. content: ['Went for drinks only. Amazing views, nice ambience, nice drinks. Thoroughly enjoyed it.', 'That said, the service was very slow (& they struggled to actually charge us for all of our drinks...) and also our cocktails were inconsistent. The same drink ordered twice came once on the rocks and once in a martini glass. Odd. Probably the upstairs and downstairs bars were working differently...']
title: Solid 3*

answer_text: ['Dear Terence,', "We would like to thank you for sharing your feedback. Our will is to contribute to our guest’s memories so we're obviously disappointed that we didn't meet your expectations. Our goal is to provide a great level of service and excellent quality of products. It is most concerning to read your comments in regards to the level of our service, especially when our team's passionate and engaged service is generally a highlight among many of our valued guests. Also we take great pride of our menu since our chef strives to create unique dishes by using the best quality of products, mostly from local producers. Thank you again for your review so we can ensure we are continually bettering our service for our future guests.", 'Jeevan & The Bokan Family']
content: ['The ONLY reason for going to this restaurant is for the view, which is really wonderful. from the top of this tower, especially at night, you have extensive views of the lights and sights of one of the great cities of the world. Enjoy this!', "It certainly is not the place for a romantic dinner. As far as we could figure, the highest floor comprises a bar with bookable table seating, with a limited bar menu, and VERY loud music. No conversation possible. On the floor below, down a short staircase, is the main restaurant, where we were booked. The 'music' noise from above resounds, but the volume is thankfully lower. Although is was Friday, and a couple of weeks before Christmas, this lower area was sparsely populated. This was a surprise.", 'The menu, in our opinion, is very limited and fairly boring. The service is not too bad, but rather mechanical: eg. you are asked if you are \'enjoying\' at critical points. The food is nicely and artistically presented on the plates, but too our surprise is not vey tasty. \'BLAND" is the word that came to mind. My first course was \'Octpus and Beetroot" and it was hard to get the taste of either of these components. Seemed like it had been boiled for hours. Second course was lamb which was equally \'non-lamby\' in taste. The wine list was all highly priced, and from unknown vineyards. We had a Spanish wine from an area with which we are familiar. The wine was good, in that it had no bad qualities, but not much going for it either. BUT THE VIEW FROM THE RESTAURANT IS FANTASTIC. A meal for two with wine set us back £175. I rationalise this as good value, being £125 for the view and £50 for the rest.']
title: My Birthday

answer_text: ['Dear Veronika,', "Your praises and comments on our friendliness are surely one of the best compliments you could ever make to us. content: ['Absolutely great night service was amazing from when we arrived great table with wonderful view of the fireworks and London great service in regards to the drinks our waiter Peter was absolutely spot on and nothing was too much trouble we live local so will be back on a more regular occasion thanks Peter for starting our 2018 the way we expected see you soon ']

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for sharing your feedback. It is disheartening to read that we could not provide a memorable experience for you during your stay and wish you only the best of travels moving forward. The satisfaction of our Guests is our first concern and our Team always shows their utmost consideration and empathy. Please know that we take your comments under serious consideration and we will address the team accordingly. We do hope to welcome you back soon.', 'Jeevan & The Bokan Family']
content: ["Fantastic views from the top floor of Novotel Canary wharf, looking back towards the centre of London. Ordered 2 drinks, cider and one of their cocktails, plus chips to snack. Drinks and mayonnaise/tomato sauce arrived promptly. Had our drinks, no sign of chips, waited and waited, the waitress came over to take away empty drinks, said haven't you got your chips ... no ... she went away, and they arrived soon after, so obviously forgotten about. Bill came to £26 so expensive for 2 drinks and chips."]
title: Wonderful view, but ...

answer_text: ["Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear we did not fulfil your expectations. Our restaurant is usually very busy, therefore we always recommend to our guests to book a table in advance. Also we are disappointed that you didn't enjoy the live music, since we receive mostly positive feedback in regards to the events that we organise, including bands and dj's at Bokan. We will take your feedback under consideration and we do hope to welcome you again soon in order to ensure a better experience.", 'Jeevan & The Bokan Family']
content: ['I was taken there for my birthday. The restaurant was full until 9pm, and so we had to settle for the bar. The place was very dark, and finding the table was not the say (for me, anyway). The awful din emitted by a woman squealing into a microphone (they tell me that it is singing; but it has nothing in common with Covent Garden) was so loud because, apparently, it has to carry over three floors in the building. The occasional breaks which she and her organ grinders took were the best bit - I could hear what was being said to me.', 'I was not impressed by the requirement to hand over my bank card before an order could be taken. What might have been done with it while it was out of my sight was a concern, although it seems to have been all right. Clearly, this Novotel has had more than its share of dodgy customers, although how they could escape easily from the 38th floor was a mystery to me.', 'I was assured that the food in the restaurant is better than what is available in the bar. This view was shared by our waiter. In my view, the meal was significantly overpriced', 'The views across London were certainly breathtaking but, apart from the wonderful company I was in, these were the best part of the evening. If I could get into the restaurant itself on a quiet night (i.e. no squealing) I might try it again, but otherwise, for me, it lies between the very disappointing and a ripoff']
title: Bellowed at over bar food

answer_text: ['Dear Zeena,', "Thank you so much for your feedback. We're terribly sorry about your disappointing experience. content: ['We booked Bokan as we had visited previously and thought the place had a wow factor. We had our nephew and niece visiting from Switzerland and wanted to share a special evening with them. The evening was ruined by the woman at the front desk (Julia?) who is quite frankly the rudest person we have ever had the misfortune to encounter in any restaurant. Despite having received an email confirming our booking she kept us standing in the corridor for 10 mins and kept insisting that we did not have a booking!! I even showed her the email. She was disingenuous and disinterested. In the end I asked to see her booking screen and was able to locate the booking immediately. She had no sense of how much embarrassment and upset she was causing to us all. She didn’t even apologise for her error. Atrocious level of service from her. ']
title: Great views - Terrible Service from Front of Desk woman!!

content: ["I've stayed here 3 times on business. ", 'Each time I have taken breakfast early (served from 06:30 during weekdays). ', 'Each time the English breakfast items are cold, at best tepid. ', "I can imagine the chef starts cooking everything around 05:00 to be ready for 06:30, then places the serving dishes under an infra red light arrangement to keep it warm. Trouble is, it doesn't work! ", 'Nothing worse than a cold clammy sausage and cold baked beans. Only thing I ate at a decent temperature was a fried egg, coz the chef cooked it while I waited!', 'Come on Novotel, find a better solution!']

title: Amazing Food & Service

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for sharing your impressions. Each day, the entire team strives to deliver a unique and memorable experience for each guest. We would like to apologise for the inconvenience with the elevators. We will definitely take your feedback under consideration and share it with our Team. We do hope to welcome you back soon!', 'Jeevan & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Bokan', 'Situated approximately a 5 minute walk from Canary Wharf tube station, Bokan sits atop the Novotel London Canary Wharf.', 'Bokan is spread over three floors (37th, 38th and 39th). The 37th is the formal restaurant, the 38th is the bar (serving bar food) and the 39th is a secondary bar area with an outdoor deck (see photos).', 'The lighting throughout Bokan is very low, which on the whole works well but definitely makes reading the menu difficult! ', "We decided to eat in the bar area on 38 and then have a drink in the bar on 39. The service on the 38th floor was fine but not great, the service on the 39th floor was much better. The bar menu is somewhat limited with approximately 5 or 6 'main' options. I ordered the burger, which was good and which came with some fries.", "It's the location of Bokan that really makes this place. The views across Canary Wharf and back towards the O2 are great.", "The only real negative was that on the evening that I was there, 2 out of the 4 elevators weren't working, which caused a bit of a queue when I was trying to leave.", 'Overall, not the best place to eat in Canary Wharf but it probably has some of the best views.']
title: Great location, average food

answer_text: ['Dear Alison,', 'Well your review is fabulous! Thank you so much for your kind words! Great to hear you liked our new place and our attentive team. Hope to see you soon!', 'Jeevan & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Fabulous views from this restaurant on the 37th floor. The food was also 1st rate, although there is a cocktail bar above you it’s still possible to have a conversation over dinner. Staff very attentive - maybe just a wee bit too much but better that than feeling adrift. ']

title: Great views and food!

answer_text: ['Dear James,', 'Thank you very much for sharing your impressions. Each day, the entire team strives to deliver a unique and memorable experience for each guest. What you are describing is not the level of service we aim for and we would like to apologise for your disappointed experience. Could you please send me an email at jeevan.thej@accor.com with your full name, date and time that you visited us, so we can investigate further? Many thanks!', 'Jeevan & The Bokan Family']
content: ['While there is no doubt Bokan is a well thought out, impressive bar & restaurant, it seems the emphasis is on the initial wow factor and stops there. The service leaves a lot to be desired.', 'We visited on a Friday afternoon, the venue was not overly busy, maybe around 30 customers. After taking a seat, we waited for someone to take our order and kept waiting. Eventually we gave up and attempted ordering at the bar, but we were completely ignored by the staff. After returning to the table we were finally able to place an order, 40 minutes after arriving.', 'There seemed to be one bar man with responsibility for making drinks, meaning we waited a further 20 minutes on our drinks coming.', "We decided to order another round, and this time we're helped by a very friendly and helpful member of staff who was happy to answer our questions regarding the drinks list. The list looks great and you are really spoiled for choice.", 'A separate member of staff then came back to us informing that two out of the three ingredients from our Negronis were not available.', 'Bokan is not short of staff, with around 8 staff on the floor at the time of our visit. However they were not not overly interested in serving us with a couple leant over the bar on their phones for the duration of our visit.', 'This bar has the potential to be one of the best in the area, with fantastic views over London. But it is hugely let down by lack of service.']
title: Complete lack of service

content: ['As a party of four we ate here on Friday night (3rd Nov)', 'We were shown to a corner table with great views of London and the O2 arena.', 'Mix up with ordering our wine meant we waited longer than we should. Also our friends had a gift card for two free drinks which the staff could not fathom!!! and therefore only one free drink arrived.', 'The lighting was low(probably for effect) which meant we had to use our phone torch to see the menu.', 'However the food was superb, the rib-eye and mash was to die for.', 'One criticism, I understand that a large percentage of staff in the service industry are from overseas but a grasp of the English language would be a help.', 'My partner always worries if the staff do not understand gluten free and it did take a while to communicate this, sorry but "I am French " is not the answer we were seeking.', 'However she was guided through the menu (in a fashion) had a very nice meal. the gf bread rolls were delicious.']

Thanks! ']
