answer_text: ['Dear Matthew,', 'Your praises and comments on our friendliness are surely one of the best compliments you could ever make to us! We are thrilled to hear your loved our hotel and the view! Hope to see you soon!!', 'Jeevan & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Bokan offers sick views across London. Its set on an extremely high floor with the skyscrapers of Canary Wharf at your feet. ', 'The interior of the place is stylish and staff are amicable. ', 'This is a destination for absorbing the view. ']
title: Incredible sunset

answer_text: ['Dear Ismael,', 'Thank you so much for your feedback. We also have received your email and we answered to it previously.']
content: ['We booked a table for 9 people at this venue backed by the mighty Novotel brand. I mentioned on a telephone conversation the reason for the booking (birthday celebration for my wife and other friends) and that we were bringing a cake. The person on the phone didn’t make any reference to any “policy” regarding this.', 'On arrival we were first treated quite rudely because we were 15 min late. They lied to me in saying that they called me to see if we were coming and that because they couldn’t talk to me they cancelled my reservation. However, after a while, they “magnanimously found a table for us”. When we arrived to the table, we were told that they were going to charge us ridiculous 5GBP per person for having a cake of our own. We said that we were willing to consume on drinks much more than that ridiculous amount which would not even equate to the price of a bottle of Champagne, and we were willing to consume several of those. The staff was totally unhelpful and unwilling to compromise to avoid ruining our celebrations, even after speaking to “the manager”, who we suspect wasn’t the real manager.', 'Because there is plenty of venues in Canary Wharf, we simply decided to leave and have our cake and plenty of drinks somewhere else. ', 'All I can say is that a view is nothing if you have such an appealing behaviour to your customers.']
title: Disastrous experience, ruined birthday celebration

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you so much for sharing the love. I hope we will see you back very soon !']
content: ['Worth a visit as an easier to book food with a view than the usual suspects. Modern lounge style with a bar on a split level.', 'To be honest it’s worth a visit as a starting point for a night out. Really cool place.']
title: Great food and view

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you for coming by and sharing your feedback about Bokan. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the place, the view and our wines ! Get in touch with our Welcomers next time, they will be more than happy to book a table for you. ', 'See you soon!']
content: ['Went to the bar for an early evening drink the views are stunning the French wine was fine! But unfortunately we had to leave the nice sofa corner and had to go upstairs because the table was reserved! Well upstairs was quite cold outside!!']
title: Beautiful sunset

answer_text: ['Hi Johanne,', 'Well your review is "absolutely stunning" !! Thank you so much for your kind words and for giving us the perfect score! Great to hear you liked our place and our fabulous team. Hope to see you soon!', 'Jeevan & The Bokan Family']
content: ["We visited BOKAN 39 during a girls weekend in London and the bar/drink/service was so great that we didn't feel like leaving the hotel - everything was perfect! The view as absolutely stunning! I would recommend it to everyone! "]
title: The best Drinks and FABULOUS VIEWS

answer_text: ['Dear Roli,', 'We are over the moon to hear your amazing review! Thank you so much. We are glad that you enjoyed the view and the friendliness of our staff. Hope to see you again!!', 'Jeevan & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Great place! The atmosphere can take you to the sky! The staff is very friendly, they can make you drunk easily.. The view is unforgettable! Great for drinks and food also! ']
title: Top view, great location!

answer_text: ['Dear David,', 'Thank you for your kind words! We are thrilled you had a good time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.', 'Jeevan & The Bokan Family']
content: ["We arrived at 2pm for the 'Brunch' and was impressed not only with the food but also the service, the views and the chilled atmosphere. The bonus was the live Jazz band at 4pm. (which plays until 7pm) They do an offer for £49.00 which includes as much Prosecco as you can drink from 2pm till 4pm. And to be fair, the waiters do not stop pouring it! Which is nice. They also serve water and ice at the table without charge. One of our group does not drink so she was given an option to choose a Mock-tail instead. Overall the food was tastey and very satisfying. There was my pet hate of the discretionary 12.5% service charge but we didn't mind paying it because the service was very good. Definitely a place I would highly recommend and a place I would look forward to returning to."]
title: A Gem in Canary Wharf

answer_text: ['Dear baobabjim,', 'Thank you for the kind words! We are thrilled you had a good time with us. ', "The service is our priority and we want our Guests to have a great and memorable experience with us so feel free to email me at Jeevan.thej@accor.com and we'll continue the conversation.", 'Looking forward to hear from you soon.', 'Jeevan & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Astounding night views across the city and Thames, welcoming staff, loft-style decor. Good looking restaurant. Food is v.good value. Chef knows her stuff with excellent fusion of styles. On this occasion, starter was Scottish venison carpaccio - clever mixture of ingredients (like pomegranate and pear) truly heighten the flavours of the venison. My main was scallops and my friend had the lamb. Lamb looked and must have tasted great as the plate was clean! As with the starter, interesting mix of flavours to bring out the best in the scallops. Most notable was the black pudding accompaniment and purees. Excellent meal. ', 'The one area they can improve is staff knowledge of the wine list. I asked if they had any SA wines and our waitress did not know and searched the menu for us. Small detail, but ability to romance the menu would have scored them Excellent.']
title: Top of the world

answer_text: ['YAY, Big thank you for your awesome review and the perfect score! It makes us proud to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us and that you are willing to share it with your friends and work colleagues. Come back soon!', 'Jeevan & The Bokan Family']
content: ['Waiting staff very friendly and helpful. Food excellent and good value, cost is in line with central London restaurants, but has the added value of great views across London.', 'Have been for both lunch and dinner, can’t fault either, will be going again and telling my friends and work colleagues ']
title: Dinner

answer_text: ["The service is our priority and we want our Guests to have a great and memorable experience with us. Therefore we're terribly sorry that you experienced difficulties with your communication with the waiter. We will definitely address the issue and thank you for pointing this out to us. We hope to welcome you back soon and ensure that you have a great experience with us!", 'Jeevan & The Bokan Family']
content: ['This is my fourth visit here and the food keeps getting better and better. The menu has been shortened and offered exceptionally good food. There was a complimentary amuse bouche which was fantastic but had no idea what it was. We just could not understand the waiter and as each course arrived the waiter tried to explain what we were eating and we ended up having to resort to Google translate. This is becoming a bit of a London trait and such a shame for fantastic restaurants such as this.']
title: Excellent food but not a clue what the waiter said

answer_text: ['Dear Mohammad,', 'Thank you for this incredible review! It was our great pleasure to make your experience memorable. We will share the love with our Fabulous Team. We hope to see you again very soon !']
content: ["Amazing view at sunset. Must visit for couples. Book a table next to the view. Its amazing to have dinner here. The burger was just amazing along with the wine. Must Visit if you're in London . "]
title: The view and Food

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'YAY ! Big thank you for your awesome review! It makes us proud to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us. Come back soon !']
content: ['We really enjoyed our bar meal of a burger - really well cooked. ', "Views are incredible. Roof terrace was especially good. We found the service to be very good. It's a great 'date night' restaurant, which I would recommend you try. "]

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', "We're terribly sorry to hear about your disappointing experience. We strive to make sure every Guest has a great time with us at BŌKAN. We do hope you will give us another chance in a near future to prove our worth."]
content: ["Have been here twice just for coffee but the level of service has been appalling both times. First outing it took ages for someone to come to our table , though the place was quite. When the coffees came they were tepid at best. Next time I tried to order 2 coffees at the bar from one of waiters but he seemed to just look at me as if it was beyond him and pointed to his colleague saying he would make then and then just walked off without telling his colleague. Then I waited and waited and nothing so I gave up. That's a just a coffee God knows what happens when you have a meal there I hate to think..... "]
title: Nice venue but terrible service

answer_text: ['Dear Clarinda,', "You're a star! Thank you for this incredible review! It is always our most treasured reward to make our Guests happy. Thanks so much for giving a shout out to Guillaume - He is shining everyday a bit more !", 'We hope to see you again very soon, I am sure Guillaume would love to thank you in person for your kind words... See you soon !']
content: ['We went to celebrate our anniversary and had been recommended Bokan by a few friends. And we were not disappointed!', 'When we arrived we were taken to our table. While this was nice, we asked if we could switch to a table where both seats looked out at the view - the staff changed our table to suit our request with no hesitation. ', 'Upon ordering our food, we asked if they could do a vegetarian tasting menu. Again, our waiter said “of course” and proceeded to explain exactly what each course would consist of, and how the could amend the fixed tasting menu to meet my needs.', 'During the meal, we found all our servers attentive but not too in your face - the perfect level of service and we certainly didn’t feel hurried or pressured in any way. We particularly liked how a few minutes was left between each course to let us digest before the next - this gave us time to chat and take in the atmosphere. The dishes themselves were spectacular - amazing flavours and well put together. We couldn’t fault it. ', 'We’d also like to thank our main waiter Guilloume who was the perfect blend of informative, friendly and professional - he really helped to make it a special evening for us.', 'We will 100% visit Bokan again, and recommend to friends! ']
title: Great food and great service

answer_text: ['Dear Guest,', 'Thank you so much for your feedback. It makes us proud to hear that you enjoyed your evening with us. See you soon !']
content: ['Had booked a table last night and were seated by the window with the most amazing views. content: ['Loved loved loved this rooftop bar !!!! Stayed in a hotel right opposite the Novotel so popped over to their rooftop bar. Would imagine this bar gets very busy on a Friday night when all the business people in Canary Wharf leave work places. I will definitely be returning here :)']

content: ["The decor, ambiance, service and views are nothing short of superb. The dinner, whilst excellent, is what I would call 'light'. All in all, though, a fabulous place perfect for a romantic evening."]

content: ['Situated on the 37-39 floors, this bar and restaurant offers great views and great vibes. Decor modern and cool. Food was presented very well and was very delicious. I had the chicken dish, with the fois grois. It was superb, I also had the halibut a d it was superb as well. ']

answer_text: ['Dear Sophie', 'Wow!! Thank you for this incredible 6 star review! We are so thrilled to hear that you had a great time. We will share this feedback with the BOKAN team, thank you so much,we hope to see you again very soon.']
content: ["Wow. This place was AMAZING. We went for their Sunday Bottomless Brunch (served until 2.30pm) which was £49pp and included all you can drink Prosecco, and 3 delightful courses. I had the scallop carpaccio and my friend had the burrata. Both winners. I then had the Wagyu Burger which was insanely good. And filling! Then the tiramisu wasn't like an ordinary one (which I was thankful of) - mmmm it was TASTY. ", 'The service was exceptional, and they even noted from my friend whilst I was in the bathroom that I was going to Dubai, and they served a little platter of shortbread and jellies with "Enjoy Dubai" on it, so cute and thoughtful.', "The rooftop is insane! SUCH great views. There's so much space in Bokan, split over 3 floors with the bar, restaurant, chill out area. I cannot fault it. Even the bathrooms had an insanely epic view!", 'The barman was ace as well, really made our evening.', 'We spent 7 hours there which FLEW by.', 'Already recommended to everyone I have seen today, and will be doing more of that as the days go on!', 'Thanks guys, what a great goodbye lunch and drinks. xxx']
title: I'd leave 6 stars if I could!

answer_text: ['Dear Guest', 'Thank you for your valuable feedback, we are truly sorry for your disappointing experience with the change in booking policy and the mis-communication. We hope you will give us another chance to shine.']
content: ["Yes the views are amazing, yes the cocktails are good but these mean nothing if the service does not live up to the expectations. Their booking policy for the terrace appears to be simply untruthful and misleading. It's understandable that during good weather it will be busy. What is unacceptable is when you ask them to book they say that the system is blocked. Even if you say that you will call later they say that you cannot book and that you will have to walk in early. You walk in early and surprise surprise, everything is already booked for the day! So basically they will not tell you that they are fully booked and you're lured in by the hope that there will be availability. This might seem like a small detail to some but the lack of decency and honesty are definitely things that will stop me from going to this place again."]
title: Untruthful booking policy

title: Smart and stylish dining with amazing views

content: ['the reastaurant by itself is beautiful, very modern and trendy !', 'the food is amazing together with the cocktail !', 'Need some improvements regarding the service, specially those who welcome the guest who just exit the elevator.', 'Very nice bar and terrace, the view is spectacular !! ']
title: Nice view, nice ambiance

answer_text: ["Thank you so much for sharing your feedback. We're so sorry to hear we did not fulfill your expectations this time. ", 'We apologise that you did not receive our usual level of service and I do hope that we get the chance to show this to you in the future. ']
content: ['We went to the bar on the 38th floor to have drinks. Decor is great, and views obviously breathtaking. ', "However, the staff are in serious need of some training. The hostess seemed very stressed by having to deal with a few people arriving at the same time, and it showed in the service we received. Then it was 25 minutes from the time we ordered drinks for 6 people, until they finally arrived. The cocktails were ok, but nothing special - lots of ice in them! 2nd drink of a glass of Taittinger champagne was flat, so didn't finish it. All of that for prices which are astronomical. Would I go back? Maybe, but I'm not in a rush."]
title: You need lots of patience to get a drink

answer_text: ['Thank you so much Thomas for such an amazing review! Charlotte and All the BŌKAN Family are very proud to read your kind words. We hope to see you again very soon too!']
content: ['Sunning view at the top of the Novotel Canary Ward tower. Well furnish and designed dinning room. Nice and tasty plates. Definitely the place to go on Sunday brunch for any occasion. This place worth a detour.', 'Charlotte our waitress has been very kind and professional.']
title: Sunning view - Sunday Brunch

answer_text: ["You're a star! Thank you for this wonderful review! We are extremely proud to hear how much you had a good time with us.", "It's hard indeed to choose one dish among the variety, we hope that we will have the pleasure to see you soon so you can try more!"]
content: ['The views from each floor looking down over the Thames up to Tower Bridge and far beyond are wonderful. The tables in the restaurant are positioned well so that every guest can appreciate the vista. ', 'The waiting service was impeccable, polite and well informed on each dish and the wines offered. However the real reason you must go to this restaurant is the food! Each dish is beautifully presented and very well composed. The combination of flavours and colours make choosing a course very difficult, every guest thought they had chosen the perfect plate. Aurelia, Head Chef, watched service with an eagle eye and it was interesting to see her so visible in the kitchen with her team.', 'All in all a perfect meal.', 'I highly recommend this restaurant.']
title: Absolutely Perfect Evening

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for sharing your comments about your recent visit at BOKAN. We are terribly sorry to hear that your experience was not perfect. What you are describing does not reflect our standards and please be assured that we have addressed your comments. ', 'We hope that we will have a chance to welcome you again at BOKAN and at the hotel in a near future.']
content: ['We paid two visits to bokan on Saturday first around 7:30pm where we were directed to the bar on the top floor this was fine and the barman prepared two rounds of three drinks as my brother came to meet us before we headed out for a meal. The cocktails were good and the service was too however when we walked over to the roof terrace to take in the views where no one was sat because of the incremental weather it felt like the security had joined our party, on taking a picture on my phone of the skyline I turned and almost bumped into one of them who was so close behind me.', 'We sat on a dry table to finish up our drinks whilst being stared at and by that time was ready to go.', 'We went for our meal and returned around eleven.', "This time we were greated well and politely taken to a table on the lower level the guy was very nice and explained that if a booked table wasn't claimed in the next ten minutes we could have that as it had better views.", 'We chose a cocktail each this time just the two of us and I went to the bar.', 'The whole ambience of the place had changed staff felt very cold and unwelcoming and stressed. We had another round and headed up to see the now darkened skyline where we were actually followed up the stairs out onto the terrace. ', 'To add to this upon looking at my receipts I have been overcharged on three of the four rounds and a service charge added even though I went to the bar for every drink.', 'I am in no way a penny pincher but why have I been overcharged and what service am I paying for? ', "There didn't seem to be any chance of a waitered service in the bar.", 'I stayed at the hotel and the room was excellent.']
title: Needs to loosen up

answer_text: ["Thank you so much for sharing your feedback. We're so sorry to hear we did not fulfill your expectations this time. ", 'We apologise that you did not receive our usual level of service and I do hope that we get the chance to show this to you in the future. ']
content: ["I booked a table for the 39th floor in a sunday evening. When we arrive to the 38th the hostess was not paying atention to the lifts and not even lift her head when we pass throught ( we thought that there was another one on the top floor) and the security stoped us asking if we need something, we mention the reservation and he pointed to the hostess. After confirming our reservation she took us to our table. The place have amazing views and the decor is fantastic. The cocktail menu is creative but maybe a bit to long. We ask for 2 cocktails that took around 20 minutes to arrive. for the second round we choose a glass of wine and a beer as we didn't wanted to wait such a long time but it took more than 30 minutes to arrive. Besides the wait for the drinks we ask for some food that never came, when we ask why the wait we've been told that nothing was ordered. The staff was friendly but unable to manage the floor. About the price, a bit expensive if we take in consideration the service."]
title: Good potential but need to work on service

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for sharing your comments about your recent visit at BOKAN. We are terribly sorry to hear that your experience was not perfect. What you are describing does not reflect our standards and please be assured that we have addressed your comments. ', 'We hope that we will have a chance to welcome you again at BOKAN and at the hotel in a near future.']
content: ["Recently I've discovered this place and decided to bring different friends to have drinks here and spend some time together over a nice prosecco glass!", "This place is split on 2 floors of which both have an internal part, with just the top floor having also a roof terrace. It's at the 48th floor. ", 'The majority of the internal design is made of wood and pastel fabric, with big cushions, chairs, and a stunning view! Literally you can see all of London!! I have the feeling of being in a winter cottage in the Alps, but with the view of being in a modern side of New York! I absolutely love it. ', 'The restrooms are also very nice and clean, and while washing your hands you still have the opportunity of looking outside and admire the view- yes from the restroom! A Big, enormous glass will give you this!', 'The only downside that I\'ve found every time I visited this place and spent money from the Bar, that I\'m starting to be seriously annoyed by it - is that when you sit down even before you ask for drinks, they say "you can be here just for 1 hour" even when there is no message on the table saying "reserved!". ', 'The best part is that after one hour NO one comes to tell you "hey you need to move!". Honestly they just need to try and tell me that - they would have no idea of how I would react. ', 'I find pretty frustrating that in a rich and expensive place like this, they could have the authority to make me move because someone else needs to sit! If the manager reads this - I have enough money to stay there for hours and hours to drink and eat and I would like to be treated with the respect I deserve as a paying customer!! ', "I really like this place, but the service and attitude I've received every time I visited this place, is disappointing. Please improve. ", 'Value on the view: 10/10', 'Value of the service: not applicable', 'General value: 7/10 ']
title: Treat people with dignity and as paying customers! Not numbers!

answer_text: [" Thank you so much for your very nice review. We're so pleased to see how much you loved BOKAN... and the views!", 'Hope to see you again very soon! ']
content: ['Breathtaking views, really friendly staff, excellent selection of locally brewed beers. Perfect for cocktail hour.']
title: Really friendly staff

answer_text: ["Thank you so much for sharing your feedback. We're so sorry to hear we did not fulfill all your expectations this time. ", 'We apologise that you did not receive our usual level of service and I do hope that we get the chance to show this to you in the future !']
content: ['Before booking my hotel for my trip, I took the time to read many many many reviews on hotels and especially this one. I have NO regret for booking this hotel. I would definitely stay there again and recommend it for sure. The only "negative" comment I had read about the hotel was the very slow service at the bar or the restaurant. OMG, beyond SLOW.......staff walked by me and totally ignored me and my friend. I even stood at the bar wanting a glass of wine, was standing right in front of the bartender who was YES I KNOW very busy, but he could have at least acknowledge my presence......It took for ever to get a glass of wine, and than had to ask for my check......Having said that the staff for the brunch if wonderful and if this obvious they are there to serve you and make sure your visit is as enjoyable as possible. Another comment, is that there doesn\'t seem to be enough tables on the 3 floors to accommodate the number of guests staying at the hotel. Also, there was NO information in the room for phone numbers such as room service, front desk, wakeup call, etc....and no visitor guide or magazine. I do have to say that these are minor issues and the hotel still deserves a 4.9 stars our of five.........']
title: Wonderful place to stay for sure!

answer_text: ["John,thank you so much for your very nice review. We're so pleased to see how much you loved BOKAN... and the views! ", 'Our friendly staff is always more than happy to accommodate any requests when possible ! ', 'Hope to see you again very soon!']
content: ['Went to Bokan early Saturday evening for family birthday drink the views were stunning of docklands the staff were very friendly the only fault was they tried to put us on a table outside in the rain but did move us when we complained ']
title: Great Views

answer_text: ["Lauren, thank you so much for your very nice review. We're so pleased to see how much you loved BOKAN... and the views!", 'Hope to see you again very soon!']
content: ["Me and my partner recently visited the Bokan while staying at the Novotel (which it is attached to) and loved it! We went every evening for a drink (3 nights in a row) before going out for dinner and all I can say is that you never get bored of the amazing views! It can get busy (especially on a Friday evening) so I would ring ahead to book a table plus the drinks are a little pricey but that didn't put us off at all!"]
title: Amazing Views!

answer_text: ['Dear Therese Jasmine,', 'Thank you very much for your review - every feedback is a gem and we appreciate you took the time to share it. We are truly sorry to hear that your experience at BOKAN was disappointing. What you are describing is not our level of standards and we would like to express our sincerest apologies. ', 'Please rest assured that the situation of the restaurant being too hot as been solved. ', 'Therese Jasmine, we hope we will have the pleasure to welcome you again at BOKAN so we can show you the amazing service we can offer and that was just a one off.']
content: ['Had dinner twice at Bokan right up on the 38th floor with a excellent view but it was extremely hot as aircon is either switch off or very weak which was not pleasant if you are in business suit. Service was slow and not great. Waiter was not friendly. Receptionist on 37th floor was not helpful and unfriendly which is strange.. Breakfast was average but at least not as hot as compare to evening time.']
title: Great view but be prepared to sweat during your meal

answer_text: ['WOW, you made our day! Thank you very much for your beautiful comment. It was our great pleasure to have you and we hope to have the pleasure to welcome you again soon!']
content: ['Very nice restaurant on 38th floor of the hotel. Wonderful views across London skyline.', 'Took brunch menu at £45 per person with unlimited prosecco during 2 hours.', 'Food very nicely presented and full of flavour. Waiting staff all extremely plesant and attentive. Would be very happy to recommend it and would love to return if I was able to.']
title: Brunch at Bökan

answer_text: ["Thank you for your review. We're so sorry to hear we did not fulfill your expectations. Every feedback is a gem and we would love to have more details about your experience so we can look into this further. I would appreciate if you could contact me by email justine.freytet@accor.com or telephone 020 3530 0550. ", 'Looking forward to hearing from you soon.']
content: ["The views are good, but the food was just ok, not exceptional. I was there for a friend's birthday party."]
title: It was ok, but not great

answer_text: ["Many thanks for sharing your feedback. We're delighted to hear your recommendations about the steak and the lamb! Lamb is my favourite too! ", "We offer a 'Express lunch' menu offer. Please feel free to send me your contact details so I can send you additional information. My contact details are justine.freytet@accor.com , 0203 530 0515", "We're sorry to hear that you did not find the service enough attentive - Service is one of our priority and we want our Guests to have a great and memorable experience with us. We'd love to have you back to give us another chance to show you the amazing service we are capable of!", 'I look forward to hearing from you']
content: ["I went here during a lunch time trip, the restaurant was generally quiet and offers good food. It's quite expensive for what it is. My general gripe was about having to order certain items separately. I think a set price lunch menu would work wonders for attracting more people from local businesses. ", 'The food was good, I recommend the steak and the lamb cutlets. Despite it being quiet, we did have to flag the staff down a few times - you would have expected them to have seen us easily, but they sat us in the quiet end of the restaurant.']
title: Nice food, good views, generally good.

answer_text: ['Hi Dan,', "We are awfully sorry to hear that your experience which started so well ended up that bad! We'd like to understand better what happened - could you please contact me to continue the conversation? My contact details are justine.freytet@accor.com or 020 3530 0515.", 'Many thanks! ']
content: ["Went for a friends birthday, and the surroundings, ambiance, and stunning views of London seemed like the ideal scene to have some drinks and celebrate. There were only 3 of us, and the staff seem friendly, the drinks kept coming, and we was having a great time. My friend accidentally knocked a drink over, and within 2 minutes the manager came over and said that security was watching us and to calm down. (Knocking the drink over may have been coincidence). We were having a great time before this and would have easily stayed in there until closing, and spent a lot more money, but this made us want to leave straight away. The gentlemen could have come over to make sure we was good if he had a concern, or seen if we needed anything, but it felt like because security said something to him, he came over as the man, and told us to calm down. It put us off and I don't think we will be going back. There are enough rooftop bars in London, which are cheaper as well, and you won't get accused of anything either. How one person can ruin a night!!!! "]
title: How one member of staff can ruin a night!!

answer_text: ["Thank you very much Charles for your awesome review! We're so pleased to hear that you had a great time with us - come back soon!"]
content: ['I attended a private event served with a delicious buffet at the bar. Canapes were varied and very tasty. The Sauvignon Blanc wine from South Africa (Te Awa Left Field) was excellent. I will definitely come back again with friends']
title: Great view and great food

answer_text: ['Hi Dave,', "Thank you very much for your review, we're glad to hear that you loved the view! ", 'We have a wide selection of crafted beer, lager, pilsner, IPA, served on 33cl bottles, from £5 to £7. ', "We're sorry that you would not be willing us to visit us for this reason - we would love to have you again."]
content: ['This is the place to go for drinks if you want fabulous views over London.', 'The outside area on the top floor is just wonderful on a hot summers day.', "The only down side is they have stopped selling draught beer, now it's only small bottles for more or less at the same price.", "I won't be going back because of this, but for a one off treat I would recommend you go and have a look."]
title: Great Views

answer_text: ["You're a star Julie! Thank you for this incredible review! The Team will be jumping for joy to read your kind words. Hope to see you soon!"]
content: ['39th Floor Good Lord!!!!!!!!', "It was beautiful, didn't feel like the 39th floor the left was soooo smooth, the cocktails girls were at it again fine dining. Magnificent views of the skyline across london. We had a two hour slot and cocktails were flowing. Waiting staff all extremely plesant and attentive. Defo coming back with hubby. A lovely meeting place with friends before dining."]
title: One has taste for fine dining

answer_text: ['A BIG THANK YOU Julia! We are over the moon to read your kind words. It was our great pleasure to make your celebration that enjoyable! We hope that we will have the pleasure to welcome you again soon!']
content: ['9 of us went for a celebratory evening. We started with drinks on the roof terrace, stunning views and attentive staff meant the evening started well. We all moved downstairs to our table. As there were so many of us, we sent our meal choices in advance. The waiter confirmed with us and noted who was having what. When the food came, everyone was served at the same time. The starters were magnificent, such intense and amazing flavours. When the main course came none of us were disappointed. The steak, fish and chicken dishes were cooked to perfection and accompanied with eye catching purées and foams that were packed with complimentary flavours. The wine was great, also full of flavour but not overbearing - just right! It seemed a shame to stop at the main course...the puddings and cheeses matched the quality and flavours we had already experienced and the sommelier picked us a wonderful wine to finish. Our waiter did a fantastic job and saw to all our every need. Thank you Bokan for making our celebration so enjoyable. ']
title: Wonderful evening...

answer_text: ["Thank you very much for your review Karolina, we appreciate your feedback. We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the food, and the views! We also understood that they were a few lapses that we can easily correct to make your next visit perfect! We hope we will have you back very soon "]
content: ['We all enjoyed our food - the crab salad&scallops( slightly too sweet for my taste) for starters and then he boys had steaks (very good quality meat done to perfection), lamb & sea bass for the girls- all beautifully presented. A dessert - chocolate mousse was a bit of a let down, though. ', 'Our waitress could be slightly more attentive. We were splitting the bill four ways, but I was paying for my boyfriend and myself, but she charged my card twice for a single person, instead adding up two numbers.. a bit weird. ', 'Much as I enjoyed the restaurant, the bar lacked the ambience and comfortable chairs. Cocktails were not that great either even though they charge as much as the Beaumont in Mayfair. ']
title: Great food great view

answer_text: ["Oh, what a great review Amrita! We're absolutely thrilled to hear how much you had a great time with us. Luca is indeed a true asset and he will be over the moon to read your praises.", "Thanks for the comment about the olives, it's not nice indeed and we will make sure it is always the highest quality. ", 'We think our restrooms are the best in London too ;-) ', 'When are you back?']
content: ['Went with a girlfriend for a "couple of drinks" to Bokan on the 38th Floor of Novotel Canary Wharf. The views from the Bar are really superb, having seen the views at 4.30pm, decided to stay all evening just to experience the night time views. We were certainly not disappointed, they are really really superb. As the bar has floor to ceiling windows, you get a spectacular view of central London. Luke who served us in the evening was also very nice and very friendly, he even made a bespoke cocktail for my friend. Jeevan who is the manager there came and checked on us often. To be fair we were there from 4.30pm - 1am, but even still it was very nice to be checked upon and so looked after by Jeevan. He also gave us a show around of the restaurant and the roof top bar. We will definitely return. The only small feedback would have is to change the olives in the bar, they really did not taste good, they were almost bitter. We had a great evening at Bokan and would definitely recommend to anyone to go there for a drink..friendly staff and amazing views guaranteed!! Just make sure you make a booking as it does get very busy!! Oh and before I forget, possibly the best bathrooms in London - even they have an amazing view!']
title: Bokan - 38th Floor

answer_text: ['Thank you very much Klaidas for your amazing review.', ' ', 'We are glad to read that you enjoyed your experience at BOKAN. Please be assured that I will share your beautiful review with All the team.', 'When are you back??']
content: ['I was really excited about coming here particularly after all the hype, the restaurant and bar did not disappoint. The food was perfect and what you would expect from a restaurant like this. The menu is not incredibly long but it does have to offer a great number of dishes, I would recommend the squid as an appetiser and the lamb or to be on the safe side: go for the rib eye steak, you cannot go wrong with it. The interior is fantastic with its large windows that provide you with a great view of London from above. I will definitely be coming back, especially for the bar, which offers a huge range of interesting non-classical cocktails. A lot of the negative reviews of Bokan focused on the service, I honestly have no complaints about the service whatsoever, everyone seemed friendly, helpful and attentive to our needs.']
title: Food with a View

answer_text: ["Such a great review! We are over the moon to see how much you had a good time with us, can't wait to welcome you for a lunch or a dinner!"]
content: ["What amazing view! 360 degrees over London, Thames, the docklands and the Isle of dogs. Incredible!! This place is very stylish and chique, so make sure you reserve a table, to make sure your trip is worth wile. Only went for drinks but they tasted delicious, staff was attentive, went during lunch it wasn't that busy. A must go!!! "]
title: Amazing views in stylish atmosphere

answer_text: ["A massive thank you from the bottom of our hearts! The BŌKAN Team is concentrating their efforts towards a common goal, making every meal a unique and unforgettable experience. We're extremely happy to see you had a great time with us. The amuse-bouche is a Tomato emulsion, chick pea croquette and basil. We're sorry we've been clumsy - we will address it to make sure you have a perfect experience next time you visit us. We look forward to seeing you soon!"]
content: ["Didn't quite know what to expect when I randomly chose this place for dinner. My first impression was bit reserved, as the restaurant felt really noisy. Is adjacent to the bar, which plays music loud. Menu however looked promising; short, simple but full of interesting combinations.", 'Service was attentive from the beginning, but there was some clumsiness as well: waiter splashed good amount of wine on the table while pouring to my glass. First they served a beautiful amuse-bouche: some kind of tomato foam with a polenta (?) chip. My main course seared Sea Bass with green olive purée, artichokes, clams and olive oil was absolutely delicious, brilliant combination of flavours, I totally fell in love with the olive purée! For dessert I chose tropical meringue with coconut, mango sorbet and candied cashew: fresh, fruity and light in the mouth, mango gave lovely kick to the meringue and coconut. Jackpot! ', 'Overall, this place is quite pricy and routines may not be polished yet, but the high quality of food, friendly attentive staff and brilliant flavour combinations would make me return.']
title: Superb food, attentive service

answer_text: ['Dear Jamie,', 'We have already been in contact in regards of this matter. We are sorry that your stay finished on a negative note and we truly hope we will see you again soon.']
content: ["Stayed at the Novotel with my family for three nights. Visited Bokan on the Friday night and it's clearly a popular venue for the beautiful people. However, on our last night I asked reception if it was ok to take my son up to the bar to see the London skyline, as it's spectacular. No problem he said.", "We went up to the 38th floor to be met by a young woman behind the desk who said if reception said it was fine to let a 12 year old in then it was fine. Juan behind the bar had other ideas. He said he weren't welcome and despite the place being empty, it was a condition of their licensing laws. First time I've been refused two glasses of Sprite in a hotel bar! ", "So, back down to the reception where the chap who said it was fine apologised profusely. Apparently if my son had been 13 rather than 12 it would have been fine. I lodged a complaint as I've never been humiliated like it by a hotel bar in my life. Another more sympathetic member staff agreed that it was outrageous. ", 'On the Friday night I was in it there does seem to be a thread common in other reviews. Staff are unnecessarily rude and customers (including hotel guests,) are treated like we are lucky to be there. ', 'Skyline is spectacular but if you want to be treated like a human being try AquaShard. ', 'A horrible experience and one that really took the shine off a wonderful hotel. ']
title: A Humiliating Experience

answer_text: ['YAY, Big thank you for your awesome review! It makes us proud to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us. Come back soon!']
content: ["Visited on a Friday night with two girlfriends. Arriving early for dinner, I just assumed I'd be able to go to the bar first. On arrival it was clear that the bar equally has to be booked but fortunately they could accommodate me. ", 'Tip: Ensure you book at the bar as well as the restaurant if you want drinks before dinner.', 'Service during drinks was really lovely: Attentive, friendly, and prompt. Cocktails are around £13, well explained on the drinks menu, delicious and very pretty. ', 'Dinner for us was a 6 course tasting menu (£60) with bubbles and wine on top. See photos for the excellent food. Pretty, delicious, perfect sized portions so we went away full but not over stuffed. ', "Watching the city go from light to dark is stunning, as you'd expect, and the bathroom with a view is a fun touch. ", 'Will definitely go back before the summer is over to experience all over again. At 10 mins walk from Canary Wharf station, the location is convenient too, and easy for taxis to find and pick up due to hotel (Novotel) entrance. ']
title: Bookings required for drinks and dinner. Excellent service, fantastic tasting menu, and those views!

answer_text: ["Awhh, your review is heart-warming! It is always our great pleasure to have you at BOKAN Alice and we're thrilled to see how much you loved the brunch.", "When are you back? We're missing you already!"]
content: ['Amazing brunch with view/ food amazing/ bottomless bubbles/ live jazz on the terrasse from 4pm', 'I had the melon soup with goat cheese gyoza and the beef. Just incredible. Getting even better everytime I come']
title: Brunch

answer_text: ["We love your review Gabrielle! We're over the moon to read you compliments, thank you!", 'We hope we will have the pleasure to welcome you again very soon']
content: ["We had a superb experience here - incredible brunch. The food was mouthwatering and looked and tasted incredible, staff were also excellent. I had the tortellini, highly recommended. The dessert was a standout experience as well, wonderful chocolate tart (everything was great though). You won't be disappointed by the view!!!"]
title: Delicious brunch, amazing setting

answer_text: ["Thank you very much for your review Marcus. We're glad to read that you loved the view! Guest feedback is imperative to maintain the level of personal service that we strive for and we're sorry that your experience was not perfect due to the delay of the service. We hope you will give us another try soon?"]
content: ['If you want some superb views of the city then this is the place to be! You can see Tower Bridge, the Eye, Shard etc and have a panoramic view of the centre of London. ', "If you are in a rush then this isn't the place to be. We waited 20 minutes for 2 coffees on a quiet Sunday night."]
title: Great views, slow service

answer_text: ['YAY, Big thank you for your awesome review! It makes us proud to hear that you enjoyed every single aspect of what we offer at BOKAN (even the wahrooms!). Come back soon!', 'PS: please note that BOKAN Bars is accessible to +18 but people below 21 may be asked to show a proof of age. ']
content: ['Wonderful view from the 37th, 38th and 39th floors of the Novotel Hotel at Canary Wharf . There is a street level entrance which gives access to an exclusive elevator that goes direct to the 37th floor . Fantastic 360 degree views of the city . Even the washrooms have views as you wash your hands . Great chef prepared meals from starters to desserts . Now this place serves quality over quantity food. On the pricey side but food definitely will excite your palette . The 37th floor is the restaurant , 38th floor are for cocktails which does not permit people below 21 yrs of age . The 39th is the rooftop bar . There are telescopes positioned around the place for free viewing of the sorroundings . Posting pictures of platings. Wonderful place , especially for special occasions. Service was good. Make reservations ahead.']
title: Quality food, Great View

answer_text: ["We are very disappointed to hear that you did not have a good time with us. We are very surprised to read the poor customer service you are describing here. Service is our priority and we All strive for our Guests to have a great and memorable experience with us. We are very concerned by guests' feedback and I would be more than happy to discuss directly with you about this experience. ", "Please email me at jeevan.thej@accor.com or by phone at 07 767 846355 and we'll continue the conversation. Many thanks."]
content: ['The staff are incredibly rude and make the prices up as they go along. Avoid, it\'s not as good as the staff think they they are.....We were there last night and the entire staff force were some of the rudest people we have ever had the misfortune to be "served" by. At the door the front of house had the snottiness attitude and was not the least bit welcoming. The bar staff had unwarranted attitude and were argumentative at every opportunity irrespective of the amount of money we were spending. They had the utter nerve to keep changing the prices of our drinks because the menus were in the "process of being updated"! Here\'s a tip, update the menus and THEN put them on the tables! Don\'t tell your staff to come up with rough numbers and then get aggressive when we state our basic consumer rights.... Unfortunately we have to return here in a few weeks for a corporate event. We\'ll be passing this review to our events team Monday in case there\'s the possibility of moving to another venue.']
title: You have no right to be this rude to paying customers!

answer_text: ["We're terribly sorry to hear about your disappointing experience. ", 'We can assure you that this is not a true reflection of the service we want to offer here at Bokan. I would like to have more details about your experience with us. Please contact me directly either by email at Jeevan.thej@accor.com or by phone at 07 767 846355.']
content: ["This place is beautiful but it's a total rip off. Firstly the lady on the door didn't want us in the bar. We turned up early as booking an area for 2 hours was £600! She said if we could find a table then we could sit at it but she didn't like the idea of 20 people and not sure why as we all have jobs and money! It took a man in our party to get a table for us and then she gave me dirty looks all night. The last straw was the prices advertised on the menu were not what we were charged. The prosecco was £10 more! Also they add 20% to your bill when you buy from the bar! Surely this is not legal! We have a company party there in 2 weeks time, I will be very rude when I go back because the staff are up themselves big time!"]
title: Terrible staff

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for sharing your feedback about your recent experience at BOKAN.', 'We are truly disappointed to hear that you did not have a good time with us. Service is our priority and we All strive for our Guests to have a great and memorable experience with us. I would like to have more details about your experience with us. Please contact me directly either by email at Jeevan.thej@accor.com or by phone at 07 767 846355.']
content: ["The bar lounge on level 39 has really lovely panoramic views. Unfortunetly, the service is dreadful. I have never come across such rude staff anywhere in London. My colleague's birthday drinks were totally ruined. The hostess on level 38 was abrupt with no customer skills. I was made feel unwelcome. Bar staff on level 39 were even worse. On several occasions when trying to buy a drink I was totally ignored. After waiting for some time I was told I had to queue somewhere else. No further details were given or explained to me. Buying a drink each time was such a challenge. Settling payments was another issue - each time different prices were applied for the same drink. A tall waiter kept coming to our area throughout the night reminding us how we should have booked a table, despite half of the reserved ones being empty. I don't understand why would you want to turn spending clients away when the place is half empty. The overall experience was very disappointing. As an employee based in Canary Wharf, I was very excited about the opening of this venue. I thought it would be great for team outings, Friday drinks, leaving parties, etc. There is no way I'm coming backing to Bokan and will not recommend to it to anyone in Canary Wharf. When you charge premium prices for food, drinks and service, you just have to do better than my last night's experience."]
title: A venue with great views and appalling service

content: ['The Vibes:', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'It is undeniable that the core reason for visiting Bokan is the sensational view. However, the trip to the dockyard location is entirely worth while as the thoughtfully rustic decoration and slick service make for a stylish dining experience.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'What we Ate: ', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'The food menu has been created by Aurelie Altemaire, the former Head Chef at L’Atelier de Joël Robuchon and the cocktails have been created by Danilo Tersigni, former GM at Mr Fogg’s.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'The seared scallops with a citrus tang served on a bed of organic pearl barley warm salad, limoncello and wakame.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Premium Aberdeen Angus beef tartar served with crunchy sesame crisp and wasabi mayo for that extra kick.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'The beautifully presented Whole lobster is served with green mango salad, orange & jasmine sauce.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Thoughts:', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Along with the excellent views, the food in Bokan lives up to the setting. This is the perfect unique surrounding for celebrations and gathering. You can book this wonderful space for private hire to seriously impress for your summer party in Canary Wharf.']
title: New Restaurant with Amazing London Skyline View

answer_text: ["Wow, it seems you've been BOKAN-ized! Thank you so much for your praise. The Team will be extremely happy to read your review. Come back soon!"]

title: Amazing value for the quality!!

Both tables had an excellent view each from different sides of the building which was great.The cocktails were imaginative as was the food. We had the tasting menu so we could sample a number of things. We were both very full and sated at the end!']

content: ["What an awful place. The staff were hopeless, took forever to take our order and serve us. To top it off, they actually ruined my birthday surprise that was arranged for me by my friend. answer_text: ["Thank you so much for your feedback! We're extremely happy to read how much you had a great time with us at BŌKAN! The views are pretty amazing indeed.", 'We have updated our menus online - sorry for the inconvenience. ', 'Hope to see you soon on a warmer and less windy day! ']
content: ['The view here really is beautiful - especially at night. It was still sunny when we went for dinner in the evening (beware - it gets bright!) so I would probably recommend coming here when the sun has set. ', 'Our waitress was super friendly. We also made a reservation for the terrace lounge after our dinner. ', "Food was pretty good. Not cheap, but for what you get and for the view, I think the pricing is reasonable. Although the menu online has the wrong pricing! A lot of the dishes went up by a few £s - would've expected prices to be accurate online!", "We ordered the scallops for starters, lamb and sea bass for mains with veg and chips for sides, and cheesecake for dessert. Starter was small, but delicious and both mains tasted good and were also pretty filling. Cheesecake was a bit different from your normal cheesecake - it was ok, but I wasn't a huge fan.", 'We went up for late night drinks in the terrace lounge and the cocktails were reasonably priced. Shame it was quite windy and cold, as the views from up there are stunning.']
title: Amazing night time views

answer_text: ['We are over the moon to hear your amazing review! Thank you so much. Hope to see you again']
content: ['Worth coming here for the views. Needless to say the cocktails are great and the food was excellent. I dont normally go for burgers, but I had the burger here and really enjoyed it. It is expensive but what you really come for are the views. 38 storeys up with a great view of the London skyline - by day or night. We saw Tower bridge opening in the distance! There is loud music and lots of banker types, but we got a table both times we visited the bar (we only ate bar food here) and had a lovely evening. Definitely worth a visit.']
title: Expensive but fun, amazing views

', 'The views from the restaurant are impressive and the industrial decor amazed me. ', 'Definitely one of the top restaurants in the city. ']

answer_text: ['Wow. Thank you for such an amazing review! It is always our most treasured reward to make our Guests happy. We hope to see you again very soon too!']
content: ["We have visited the bar on the 38th and 39th floor of the new Novotel hotel. This place has a really relaxed chilled atmosphere during the day and lively in the evening. Well designed except maybe the chairs which lack of comfort, absolutely stunning views of central London and East London. More importantly the cocktail menu is original and if you don't fancy any of it, the experienced bartenders can be creative around your taste buds. The oudoor space is fantastic spot, although you can imagine in high demand. So book a table in advance. Has become our regular since it's opening. Quite surprising to find such venue in a Novotel. "]
title: Bokan Bar - Best bar in Canary Wharf

answer_text: ['Dear Roy,', 'We are terribly sorry to hear about your disappointing experience and we would like to express our sincerest apologies.', 'As one of our regular guests, I am sure you would agree that this is not the usual level of service we provide – please rest assured that it was not Julia’s attention to come across in a rude manner. ', 'Please feel free to contact me directly at capucine.viguier@accor.com and I will personally organise your next visit.', 'I hope you will give us another chance to show you the true hospitality and service that we are able to deliver.']
content: ["Myself and my girlfriend have eaten at the restaurant a few times and also regular users of the bar and we have even booked New Year's Eve there. We decided to take two friends of ours for a drink for the first and although we didn't make a reservation we went upon arriving we was told all the tables are full which we accepted and went to have a drink at the bar whilst waiting for our drinks someone left and a table become available which we sat down to enjoy the bottle of wine and also cocktails we ordered. We was then approached by Julia who should not be working front of house and rudely said you cannot sit there even though there was no one else to take the table at the time truly disgusted with her attitude and really had put he of going to what is in theory my local bar I suggest Mondrian at London Bridge there rumpus room bar is a lot more better run with friendly staff."]
title: Terrible rude service avoid

answer_text: ["Thank you for such an amazing review! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed every aspect of what we offer here at BŌKAN. Thank you for your kind words - see you soon?"]
content: ['A last minute decision to have a meal with my daughter. The views and position of tables in the restaurant means that everyone can see the dramatic skyline towards the Shard. The waiting staff were kind, considerate, efficient, and very professional. The food was perfect, a great menu with a good selection for any palate, beautifully presented, and delicious to eat. The Chef came out to say hello and we heard her story of coming to work at Bōkan. All very interesting and made us feel very welcome. I would highly recommend this restaurant.']
title: Delightful Evening

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for taking the time to share your opinion on TripAdvisor about your recent experience at BOKAN.', "We are very disappointed to hear that you did not have a good time with us. Service is our priority and we All strive for our Guests to have a great and memorable experience with us. We are very concerned by guests' feedback and we would be more than happy to discuss directly with you about this experience. Please, do not hesitate to contact our Bar Manager directly either by email at Jeevan.thej@accor.com or by phone at 07 767 846355 should you like to share more details.", 'I hope you will give us another chance to show you the true hospitality and service that we are able to deliver.']
content: ['I visited Bokan on Friday night for a few drinks in your rooftop bar (39) with a few friends for one of their Birthdays. We were always going out after but really wanted to visit this place as it has of course recently opened and looked amazing. ', 'When we arrived we were a little early so fully understandable that the table wasn’t ready but saying that, I called a good 30 mins before we was going to arrive and whoever answered the phone said the table was already ready. We stood there awkwardly in everyone’s way by the entrance for a good 10 minutes waiting for someone to simply wipe down the table and clear the glasses so we could take a seat. As we finally got taken over to the table 3 of the 5 of us take a seat and 2 of us left standing as there was only 3 chairs when the booking was for 5! ', 'As your waiter frantically panicked looking for 2 chairs, lucky another table offered us their 2 stools as your waiter came back saying he couldn’t find any. By now you can imagine I wanted to just get up and leave due to the shambles going on around me. Couldn’t get a table with enough chairs, could just about get my table and everyone seemed a little too busy to listen to what I was saying or to help. Seemed a little under staffed to me.', 'Finally we are at the table and 15 minutes later we get given the menu so we can order a drink. After waiting another 20 mins for her to come back and take our order, we sat there patiently and waited for our drinks. By now I wondered if they were ever going to turn up but eventually they did. I didn’t think it took that long to make a drink, we didn’t even order food! Again, must have been understaffed as it wasn’t particularly busy but all we have done so far is wait. Extremely inattentive.', 'The drinks finally arrive! I have ordered my favourite cocktail (that isn’t even on the menu) a Pornstar Martini. At first glance is looked amazing and by now I was so thirsty I was ready to drink it in 1! I sat there and thought, this is going to be so good and make up for the experience we have had so far, but…. It was rancid. I don’t know if your bar staff have ever had a pornstar martini anywhere else but I have never had such a sour tasting, dry, small pornstar martini in my life. Even the prosecco on the side was again, extremely dry and sour to the taste. I would never order a Pornstar Martini from here ever again, even worse that one I have had from the likes of Be At One or All Bar One and this is supposed to be an amazing rooftop bar competing with the likes of Radio Rooftop and Rumpus Rooms and it was just not even comparable. Id compare it from my experience so far to my local Weather Spoons.', 'Right, ive had enough, we are leaving, attic bar is around the corner and ive been there before and know it is a safe bet. This is me trying to salvage what dignity I have left as I have recommended this to everyone and booked it for a friends Birthday and it was just a shambles. Trying my best to keep spirits high as everyone looks like they have just had enough and want to go home.', 'I manage to finally get hold of someone to get my bill as no one is giving eye contact so unless you chase after them, you are out of luck. I hand over this little business card that you get free at the front with a little number on it to get my card back (cant even supply the plastic tabs) and 10 minutes later get my card, and guess what? The completely wrong receipt.', 'You literally managed to give me my card back with someone’s else’s receipt order. You can imagine how this looks, you could have given my card to the right person or if I hadn’t have checked it, I would have paid nearly a £300 bill for my 5 drink order.', 'I flag this up immediately to get my correct receipt. With this one I ask politely to take the service charge off my receipt as I refuse to pay 12.5% for what was terrible service. Your waiter comes back with yet another receipt. This time it is our order but there appears to be an extra bottle of Rose wine on there! Again not what I ordered. Like how bloody hard isit to print a receipt out of what we ordered on our tab with our table number? Obviously very difficult.', 'This isn’t the end though, here comes the embarrassing bit your end. When she (the original guy was obviously too embarrassed to come over) comes over to take the payment she asks ‘Why do you not want to pay the service’, I hate to say it as I am not a rude person, but I laughed in her face, I said you cant prepare a table with 5 chairs, cant put correct orders onto a receipt and im surprised I even got my bank card back. And you want me to pay you for this? She stood there stunned and said ‘the company make us ask’. ', 'If this is true then you should be ashamed of yourselves. You charge good money for drinks alone but then expecting me to pay the extra 12.5% for the worst service I have ever received. I have received better service ordering a Bic Mac at 4am. It is up to the people paying if they want to pay service charge, hence why it is optional. To make your staff ask as to why is horrendous, everyone was looking at them and to think that is going to put me on the spot like it would most people, you are very wrong. I raised my voice and explained exactly why as your other customers listened in, in shock.', 'I don’t know if this was just a bad experience I had or if this is just what to expect from this place. Big name, great advertising, well set up with amazing views and good money spent on the interior! But as to the service, staff and drinks, unless I see a lot of good reviews go in soon, I don’t think I will be going back or recommending this to any one I know. This just really lowered the mood and pretty much ruined our night when it was supposed to be the highlight!', 'I hope your service will improve so no one else experiences what I did on Friday night.']
title: Absolutely Appalling!

answer_text: ["Thank you so much for your amazing feedback! It was our great pleasure to welcome you. We're glad to hear that you had a great time with us and that you love the food! We do hope you'll visit us again soon. "]
content: ['The restaurant Bokan 37 is a must try in London. ', 'Located in the Novotel Canary Wharf, this place will not disappoint you.', 'The adornment is unique in its own style. ', 'Being the tallest hotel in the area pays off: the restaurant offers sublime panoramic views of London’s skyline.', "The cuisine is remarkable; a mix of British and French, the two cultures of time altogether at one place. The food is so tasty that it can’t be expound in words. The Bokan 37 is bringing the best of the culinary industry; the Head chef is famous Aurelie Altemaire, formerly working at L'Atelier De Joël Robuchon therefore you can only expect food that lives up to a high standard. ", 'I am definitely coming back!']
title: Sublime Panoramic Views + Good Food = Perfect London Evening

Or perhaps they are trying to do it on the cheap but with main courses nudging 30 pounds and plenty of pass through clientele they done really need to care I suppose. I can't recommend this place"]

answer_text: ["Thank you very much for sharing your impressions. We are terribly sorry you could not experience Bokan for your boyfriend's birthday. We have indeed a holding table policy and the available tables you have seen were surely booked for later reservations. ", 'Our Team is multicultural with over 25 different nationalities & origins and making All our Guests Feel Welcome is in our DNA.', 'We would love to have you back so we get the chance to offer you an amazing Bokan experience. Please feel free to contact me directly at justine.freytet@accor.com and I will personally organise your next visit.']
content: ['Extremely disappointing. Will not be returning or recommending to others.', "We booked this restaurant for a special occasion, a birthday meal for my boyfriend. Initially the doorman to the hotel at the entrance tried to turn my boyfriend away despite the fact he was wearing a shirt and trousers, he was also wearing white converse and therefore 'trainers'. As we were not informed there was a dress code upon booking a table, I have suspicions this could have been because another reason such as his race and nothing to do with what he was wearing. I did look on the website post our visit under their policy section to describe the dress code as .....", "'Smart casual. No athletic sportswear and shoes, no flip flops, no beach wear. Denim is acceptable. The team reserves the right to deny entrance should a guest’s attire and overall presentation not adhere to our dress code.' ", 'After making it up to the floor of the restaurant we were then told that as we were now 10 minutes late and therefore could no longer seat us at a table. Instead we were told we could have a seat at the bar if we wished. However, as the restaurant was not even half full this seemed unreasonable why staff flat out refused to seat us at a table for lunch. Needless to say we swiftly left and instead dined at The Big Easy, a few minutes away on the DLR. ', 'I suggest that the policy on dress code as well as the cut off for on a booking is explicitly made clear when booking a table so others do not also waste their time.', 'We will not be trekking halfway across London to this establishment again. Dreadful.']
title: Extremely disappointing. Dreadful service.

content: ['It is the second time we have visited the Bokan 38, and although the food is amazing, the service once again was very poor.', "The hostess welcoming us was quite abrupt (on 38, not ground floor), and for the duration of our lunch didn't spare a smile.", "Our waitress was lovely and smiling, but didn't follow through the lunch: ie after our food was brought (by other people), she reappeared when we were finished to ask if everything was ok. My husband explained that although the food was excellent, no as I had to go to the bar to ask for cutlery, salt&pepper, and sauce, that half of my club sandwich was cold, and the burgers were just warm. So she proceeded in telling us that if we wanted a dessert , that would be on the house However, we never saw the menu. ", "We had asked a second round of drinks to the young lady who served us the food, and not being a waitress, she went to the bar to ask someone to come to the table to take the order...it never happened! I had to go to the bar to check on the order to be told that they didn't have it, to go back to the table that someone would be there shortly.....We had the second round after finishing the food. Long...too long.", 'However, when we asked for the bill, it comes very quickly with the card machine.', 'What can I say, the view is breath taking and the concept is great, but most of the staff there should have a thorough reminder of what pro-activity and customer service are.']
