Please note that we have live band every Friday evening and Jazz on the roof every Sunday. We hope to see you again very soon too!']
content: ['Spectacular location for this brand-new restaurant and bar, on top of the Novotel Tower Canary Wharf (38th & 39th floors). Either if you go there for a few drinks at the bar, or for a proper meal at the restaurant, you will not be disappointed, as the venue displays a 360 view over the financial district and central London in general (Hello Shard!).', 'Outside space can be a bit windy sometimes, although well covered to shelter guests from the infamous London rain.', 'Live music every day is a nice touch.', 'Drinks are excellent, and bartenders are able to prepare also cocktails off the menu.', 'It is advisable to reserve a table in advance, as this place is the new sensation in London at the moment, so it can be very busy, and I am sure it will soon become a staple for happy hours, mostly during the forthcoming summer season.']
title: Touching the Sky

answer_text: ['We loved reading your review, thank you so much! ', "The view of London is indeed outstanding and we're glad you appreciated it, as well as the Jazz on the rooftop. Service is one of our priority and we are sorry to read that it was too slow. We'd love to have you back for another experience with us, see you soon?"]
content: ['Regardless of the slow service (30 minutes for starter to arrive having waited 10 to be asked for drinks after being seated, the overall experience was very good.', 'The senior waiting staff offered complimentary glass of wine and dessert which made up for the service issue and it seemed they had many people arrive just before we did.', "The views are spectacular and I would recommend it over the restaurants at the Shard, being able to get fresh air and have live jazz on the terrace is in my mind a better experience here than what you'll get at the Shard eateries."]
title: Fantastic venue, views and food. Service is slow.

answer_text: ["A massive thank you from the bottom of our hearts! The BŌKAN Team is concentrating their efforts towards a common goal, making every meal a unique and unforgettable experience. We're extremely happy to see you had a great time with us. Hope to see you soon"]
content: ['We were curious to have lunch out at this new venue in the Novotel and thoroughly enjoyed our meal there. My husband had a light crab entrée which was attractively presented. I had the most beautifully cooked grilled fish and our son enjoyed his very satisfying lamb dish. Our artistically presented desserts completed a very enjoyable lunching experience. All beautifully served.']
title: Lunch on the 37th floor

answer_text: ['Your review has us blushing! It makes us proud to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us. Come back soon!']
content: ["The food is exquisite and beautifully presented, the staff are incredibly friendly and attentive. Bearing in mind the wonderful views and high standard of dining, it's very fairly priced. Loved it!"]
title: Amazing food, gorgeous views, lovely staff

answer_text: ['Thank you so much for your kind words! Great to hear you liked our new place and its Fabulous team. Hope to see you soon!']
content: ["This place is just amazing and if you go on a nice clear day, you'll be there for a treat.", 'Make sure you book a table if you go on normal busy hours.', 'All members of the staff were happy and friendly, the food was very good (I had seabass) and the prices not too bad. ', 'Make sure you take your sunglasses if you go there when the sun is shining. ']
title: Amazing views for dinner or deinks

answer_text: ["We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed every aspect of what we offer here at BŌKAN! Thank you for your feedback. It makes us proud to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!"]
content: ["So, on the recommendation of a friend, and seeing the published photos this looked a great place to have dinner and also see the London skyline. It certainly didn't disappoint. Our table was booked for 7.15pm and we were promptly walked to out table. A cloudy day, and what could have dampened the view , soon changed to sun streaming through the cloud to highlight The Shaard and Millenium Wheel, sites we were able to see from our seats at the window table. Although the table had a 2 hour rebooking slot, something made clear in the booking, we were not made to feel as though we had to rush off or that someone was waiting for the table. As for the food. Well this has to be some of the best I have tasted in a while. From the 'amuse-Boucher ' to the main course of fillet steak, all tasted amazing. Will definitely be going back. Will have to just make up a special occasion to justify the visit. The icing on the proverbial cake has to be the roof terrace. The views from here, once evening had taken hold, were amazing. Being a little chilly that evening meant we couldn't spend as much time out there as we would have hoped but in the summer, provided it's not too British, this will be the only place you will want to be."]
title: Awesome, Awesome, Awesome

answer_text: ["Many thanks for sharing your feedback. We're delighted to hear you loved the food. The service is our priority and we want our Guests to have a great and memorable experience with us. We'd love to have you back too !"]
content: ['Had a romantic dinner here, views are great. Its a dark, modern vibe, food was fantastic.', 'Service was friendly but a bit hectic, our waiter was lovely, however, other staff kept also coming to the table. Was a bit too much, then one of the Managers took my unfinished glass of wine away when I was not paying attention!!! I told my waiter and he was very apologetic, replaced the glass full, and when our bill arrived ALL our drinks were taken off the bill, which was a more than kind gesture. I think the feel of the staff came across like they were not sure what was going on, however I think the place had only just opened. I would return to this restaurant again.']
title: Great Views & Food, but expensive

answer_text: ["Thank you very much for sharing your feedback. We're glad to hear that you still enjoyed the view but extremely sorry and disappointed that your experience with us was not perfect. Service is one of our priority and we are sorry to read that it was too slow. Please be reassured that your valuable feedback has been shared with the Team. We'd love to see you again to give us another chance to shine."]
content: ["Live close by so decided to go for a few cocktails. Booked online a week ago. We arrived tonight and were seated quickly. Rooftop view of London is amazing in all directions. There were lots of security guards, some friendly, others less so. We were given a cocktail menu within 5 minutes of sitting down. No sign of waiting staff 15 minutes later so went to the bar to order. They take your card number to open a tab. Only stayed for one drink as a bit chilly and the seating wasn't great. Paid the bill not noticing that a 12.5% service charge was added. Very cheeky especially as I got my own drinks."]
title: Great view. Slow service

answer_text: ['Wow...A Big thank you Caroline for your awesome review! ', 'It is always our most treasured reward to make our Guests happy. The BŌKAN Team will be extremely proud to read your review. ', 'Can’t wait to welcome you back too! ']
content: ["Throughly enjoyed the experience @ 38 BŌKAN. BooKed table on the roof top for late afternoon cocktails, second round on the 37th floor and dinner on the 36th. Great afternoon and most delicious dinner. Top notch cuisine, friendly staff and most professional. Very impressed. Chicken with foie gras and curry Osso Bucco cooked to perfection. Can't wait to return"]
title: Sunset and dinner @ Bōkan

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for taking the time to share your opinion on TripAdvisor about your recent experience at BOKAN.', "We are very disappointed to hear that you did not have a good time with us. We are very surprised to read the poor customer service you are describing here. Service is our priority and we All strive for our Guests to have a great and memorable experience with us. We are very concerned by guests' feedback and I would be more than happy to discuss directly with you about this experience. Please, do not hesitate to contact me directly either by email at justine.freytet@accor.com or by phone at 020 3530 0515 should you like to share more details.", 'I hope you will give us another chance to show you the true hospitality and service that we are able to deliver.']
content: ["After my last dismissal attempt to make a booking i decided to visit unannounced to this well reviewed restaurant. It has a number of good reviews but i cannot see why at all. On arrival at the Novotel reception we were greeted by 5 members of staff all carrying IPads wow you may say? they directed us to the bar, but i could not see the reason for their presence as they didn't speak to us we spoke to them, very odd.", "On exiting the lift to the restaurant area we were met again by a very pretty young female maitre d, thats were that ends, she was confused and couldn't understand why we were there?", 'We left the foyer and approached the bar were by we noticed behind the bar, 2 males picking leaves for garnish, 1 female waitress drinking a glass of wine and another constantly walking around making no eye contact or serving customers, strange we thought in a bar? how do they make money you may well ask.', 'After waiting almost 10 minutes and not being acknowledged, we left and returned to the foyer area. I approached one of the same five greeters as we entered, and informed her of the extraordinary poor service we received, she apologized turned and carried on talking to the remaining 4 staff, i would love to meet the fool who employed this bunch!!. ', "As an employer myself, i was horrified to witness such poor customer skills and attitude to customers needs such as food and beverage, thats sarcasm!!, its obvious its not their money at stake, whilst the restaurant has good reviews this is our second time to this cheap rate hotel, this has certainly been reflected in our 2 visits, would i venture there again, no! i live here in Canary Wharf but would not recommend this restaurant or bar. Whilst tourists may stray unwittingly in, locals beware, its not good, for those who think its good value try Roka, Carluccio's, The Parlour, Plateau or The Manhattan Grill to name just 5 for those of you wishing something big and brash try Big Easy those of you who crave a view, try Nelsons column"]
title: second chance

answer_text: ["Wow, it seems you've been BOKAN-ized! Thank you so much for your praise. The Team will be extremely happy to read your review. Come back soon!"]
content: ['I went for dinner last week, and is a beautiful new restaurant, with incredible views, great service and amazing food. i really enjoy the food, was really tasty full of textures and wonderfully cook and presented']
title: amazing restaurant

answer_text: ['Wow, we love your reveiew! "The best food & drink & customer service in London!!!" That\'s some statement! Thank you thank you thank you! Come back soon.']
content: ['Please give our thanks to all Bokan team! What a great place! The best food & drink & customer service in London!!!']
title: Amazing!!!

answer_text: ["Thanks for the 5 star review. We're thrilled to hear that you liked BŌKAN - come back soon!"]
content: ['So a great sky bar with panoramic views across London. This is another great addition to Londons choices of high level bars with far reaching views and a cool interior. ', 'The usual choice of cocktails abound and the atmosphere is buzzing.']

answer_text: ['Hi Anne,', 'Thank you very much for your amazing review! Raul will be jumping for joy to read your kind words. ', 'Looking forward to welcome you back!']
content: ['We went to Bokan for drinks on the rooftop (39th floor) on a Sunday afternoon. It is an excellent experience to recommend for its decoration (East London style), atmosphere (amazing live music group) and service. Special thanks to Raul from the bar who nicely looked after us. ']

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for your review, we appreciate you share your feedback. We are terribly sorry to hear about your disappointing experience. We really want our Guests to keep a good souvenir of their experience and we would like to express our sincerest apologies it was not the case.', "I would love to hear more detail from you about your visit so that we can better address this situation. Feel free to email me at justine.freytet@accor.com ot to call me at 020 3530 0515 and we'll continue the conversation. Thank you once again and we hope to hear from you soon."]
content: ['I arrived at the restaurant to be told it was closed which was understandable given the 10pm time but was informed that bar snacks were still available. I asked for a drink and a club sandwich at the bar and was told to take a seat and someone would take my order.', "After thirty minutes a waitress noticed I'd been waiting and asked if I would like a glass of water (with a club sandwich please!!) she apologized for not noticing I was there (6 feet 1 and 16 stone) I took the glass of water and she disappeared again.", 'Thirty five minutes without a drink or food order - unfortunate as it seemed to be a great place with a nice atmosphere.']
title: Poor first visit

answer_text: ['Your praises on our attentiveness are surely one of the best compliments you could ever make to us! Thank you very much Phil for your nice review. We hope to see you soon on a sunny day for another business or social event!']
content: ['Had my first experience of Bokan last week and wow what a great location for an evening out.', 'The staff were extremely attentive in both the bar and restaurant and made the visit extra special.', 'The menu had a great selection and offered a great non complex choice which when presented looked and tasted like a top star restaurant.', "It's a pity the weather wasn't a little warmer as the terrace on the 39th floor would have been ideal to hangout and hear the live music that is often on offer.", 'I was there for a business meeting but would Highly recommend a social visit also.', 'Thanks Bokan- keep up the good work ']
title: Great evening

answer_text: ['"Top 5 worldwide" best restaurants, that\'s some statement! We\'re absolutely thrilled to hear how much you had a good time with us! Big thank you for your praises - when are you back??']
content: ['I went for dinner with my family yesterday evening. We are lucky enough to eat out a lot in top quality restaurants for business and pleasure and I can honestly say that this rates in my top 10 - probably even top 5 worldwide.', 'The taste and presentation of all the dishes was absolutely top notch. Good quality produce beautifully prepared by the talented chef. Although this can be classed as "fine dining" , unlike a lot of other restaurants who claim fine dining, the atmosphere wasn\'t at all stuffy which is great.', 'The Roof top terrace and the bar below have great views of the City skyline, the 02 and beyond. Live music plays on a Sunday which just adds to the atmosphere. ', 'The service was good without being over the top, the waiting staff and sommelier are rightly proud of the restaurant and I would heartily recommend Bokan. ', 'I will return.']
title: Fabulous food and service

answer_text: ['Thank you very much for your review and feedback. ', 'We are terribly sorry to hear that the only disappointment was with our dress code policy and that it affected your experience. We understand your frustration and be reassured that we will share your remarks with the Team. ', 'We hope you will visit us again for a seamless experience so you can fully enjoy the views and the drinks!']
content: ['We went there for a drink on a Saturday evening. The place got amazing views and is very nice with a large choice of drinks. ', 'The only disappointment was the security at the door. My friend was told by the security lady that she was being done a favour being allowed in with trainers (nice trainers not gym trainers!). The people behind us had exactly the same remark. And when we got to the bar we noticed that 40% of the customers were actually wearing trainers. This was therefore not the best welcome you can expect from a place like that. ']

We have 6 different craft beers by the bottle but not draught beers.', "We don't see the view from the lift so we can be blown away when you arrive at BOKAN!", "We can't wait to have you back!"]
content: ['Very good welcoming start from the entrance ', 'Very good service and view ', 'Drink price is quite reasonable but restaurant is bit pricey but worth it ', 'They can think about to add another premium draught beer ', 'I wonder why they did not think to have view / window from lift ?']
title: Very nice roof bar

answer_text: ['Well, your review is breathtaking too! Thank you so much for your kind words! Great to hear you loved our new place. Come back to visit soon!']
content: ['Breathtaking views, relaxed and yet upmarket. ', 'Wonderful ambience and , as expected, top notch service. ', 'Lovely outdoor top floor bar, gorgeous atmosphere, chilled music and cosy throws for when it got chilly. Loved it.']
title: Amazing night

answer_text: ["Viktorija, we would like to thank you from the bottom of our hearts for this heartwarming review! We are ready to welcome you again and again and again for lunches, cocktails, dinners, coffees... We don't have marketing positions at the moment but keep looking at us - your enthusiasm and passion is exactly our style!"]
content: ["I have visited this place about 15 times now and not because I live just 2 minutes walk away, but because it's so amazing, that I fell in love with it.", 'For the restaurant: you do need to make a reservation in advance, and if you want a window table, do mention it while booking. The menu selection is amazing, I did try almost all of it. In my opinion the best from the starters are Sea Bass Carpaccio and the Squid, for the main is definitely an Angus Steak and the best dessert you must try is a Tropical Floating Island! The service so attentive, that we were recognized from the second visit. ', "For the bar: they have one of the best selections of cocktails. And a very good Lithuanian mixologist, that I would highly recommend getting cocktails from (don't remember what was his name). All cocktails come with a nice unusual decorations and the prices are very pleasant as well. I would definitely recommend to try a Hendricks Tea Pot! The terrace is very cozy, has loads of cushions and blankets and you can even order cigars. ", "Overall, it's the best sky bar I have visited in my life and there is a special place in my heart for it. Still looking up their career page, waiting for a marketing position to come up, as I would love to show the world how beautiful this place is! I would definitely recommend it to everyone and come back many more times! "]
title: There is a special place in my heart for Bokan

answer_text: ["Thank you for the kind words Sam! We are thrilled you had a good time with us. Sorry for the delay in the Service, that's not great and we will improve that. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon "]
content: ['A very good looking venue with excellent views, including a unique rooftop terrace. The drinks are excellent and the food is above average. Many reviews have mentioned the service, and I agree that this probably the single most important issue this new venue needs to sort out. Waiting 30 minutes for a drink is not great. However, speed of bar service aside, all the staff were friendly and professional.']
title: A much needed addition to the Wharf’s bar and restaurant scene

answer_text: ["WOW, Juan is a super star indeed! He is going to jump for joy to read your kind words, thank you so much! We're absolutely thrilled you had a great time, we look forward to seeing you soon again."]
content: ['Juan, excellent service and very professional you Rock!!! whether if was a pot of tea or just a conversation you rock!!!!']
title: Great service

answer_text: ["Thank you so much for your feedback. We're terribly sorry your experience with us was not perfect. We can assure you that this is not a true reflection of the service we want to offer here at Bokan. Could you please send us an email with your full name, email address, phone number date and time that you visited us, so we can investigate further? Many thanks"]
content: ["We went for a friend's birthday lunch on a Bank Holiday. Very impressive views out over Canary Wharf, the interior has been well designed and the view from the men's loos is something else (we all made a point of going for a look). However we waited an hour for our starters to arrive and thought they were nice it wasn't worth an hour's wait. The chef clearly was struggling and sent an amouse bouche to keep us occupied but we had to ask for bread which should have come as standard. The mains were nice but I was certainly not going to leave feeling stuffed. Slight style over substance and for the price I would expect more of a complete plate of food. We were there not long after opening so it may have been a glitch, it was only half full so they would not have coped with a full service."]
title: Ok food, great views but pricey and slow service

answer_text: ["We're fan of your review! Thank you so much for your praises. We use indeed a mixture of local British ingredients to craft a menu inspired by rich European cultural cuisines. Thank you for your recommendation about the bread, we will look into this. Looking forward to welcoming you back."]
content: ['I loved this restaurant. I stopped at the hotel so experienced the high quality breakfast and ate dinner here twice. ', 'The service is outstanding and helpful. The views over London are glorious. ', "On my first visit for dinner I tried the lamb which was probably some of the best lamb I've ever tasted. The dish itself is quite rich but we ordered a side of veg which balanced it out and the veg was done well. ", 'I also tried the fillet steak. Beautifully presented with mash and roasted onions. ', 'There is a good wine list with plenty of wines by the glass. ', "My only complaint was the sharing bread seemed wasteful if you're eating alone or even for 2 people.", 'The breakfast has high quality produce carefully selected such as beautiful fruit and free range sausages. All produce appears to be British. Excellent!']
title: Fabulous

answer_text: ['YAY, Big thank you for your fantastic review! The Team will be very proud to read your kind words. Come back anytime, you will always be more than welcome in your second home!']
content: ["I'm so lucky to have this as a local bar/restaurant and have been three times since it opened. Came for a birthday lunch on Friday and it was one of the best meals I've ever had. The seared sea bass was as beautiful to look at as it was to eat and I can say the same for the chocolate and blackcurrant mousse. ", "The views are just amazing and the restaurant tables arranged in such a way as to make the most of them. When you think of how much you pay to go up the Shard (which I also love by the way!), you can come up here instead and enjoy a drink or a lovely meal for a similar price. Plus you get to see the river encircle the Isle of Dogs and get views of Greenwich and the city as well as 'up close' Canary Wharf. The ambience is stylish but relaxed and doesn't feel stuffy and the staff are lovely and helpful.", 'Love it!']
title: Amazing!

Many thanks"]
content: ["Been there twice, first time everything was almost perfect (but we were served by a friend), second time the only good things were the cocktails and the view. I'm sorry to say, but given that I work in this industry too, I would expect the whole staff to be much more professional and welcoming. One of the bartenders kept arguing with the waitresses (one of them even started to cry, everything in front of the guests), and he tried to apologise by offering us the second round of drinks. They aim to be one of the best bars in town, but they are still very far from this achievement. Still far from a remarkable experience."]
title: Far from perfect

answer_text: ["Thank you for your review. We're so sorry to hear we did not fulfill your expectations. Our service charge is only discretionary as a reward for our Team to show your appreciation regarding the service. ", 'Every feedback is a gem and we would love to have more details about your experience.', 'If you could send me your full name, email address, phone number date and time that you visited us, so we can look into this further? My contact details are justine.freytet@accor.com or 020 3530 0515. Many thanks']
content: ["The venue is great, and worth a trip for the view alone, but do not stay to eat or even drink. It took us half an hour to be seated, with staff ignoring us, and palming us off to other disinterested staff members. We eventually ordered a bottle of prosecco, which took 45 mins to arrive and 2 trips to ask why it was taking so long. We ordered a cheese platter to start, and waited almost an hour and half for this to arrive. We were however given a plate of calamari by way of apology, but we noticed that the only reason for this, was because they had ordered it by mistake, and didn't know what to do with it. The cheese board eventually arrived and was very uninspiring - not worth £20!", "We decided to go and eat elsewhere as the whole experience was a bit of a joke. We noticed we weren't the only table complaining, as wrong orders were being delivered and people were waiting ages for drinks. The mandatory 12.5% service charge really topped it off"]
title: Good view, poor service, ordinary food

My contact details are justine.freytet@accor.com // 020 3530 0515.", 'Thank you again for your nice review and honest feedback, we hope you will visit us again.']
content: ["Bokan is by far one of the coolest, most beautiful bars/restaurants in Canary Wharf. The drinks are great and the food (although the menu looks a bit boring) is surprisingly good. The service however is so horrid that if it weren't for the terrific views, most people would never come here again. Even when empty, it can take up to 30 min for a drink. It took us nearly 10 minutes to get a menu at dinner. With proper training of the staff, this place could be spectacular. Come if you're a slow drinker or if you have serious patience."]
title: Horrid service, lovely place
